content_zh: 来自能源部艾姆斯国家实验室的科学家团队开发了一种新的表征工具，使他们能够对太阳能电池的可能替代材料获得独特的见解。 在艾姆斯实验室资深科学家王济刚的带领下，团队研发出一种利用太赫兹波收集材料样本数据的显微镜。 然后，该团队使用他们的显微镜探索甲基铵碘化铅(MapBi3)钙钛矿，这种材料有可能取代太阳能电池中的硅。艾姆斯实验室的科学家理查德·金解释了新扫描探针显微镜独特的两个特征。 首先，显微镜利用太赫兹范围的电磁频率来收集材料上的数据。 这个范围远低于可见光光谱，介于红外和微波频率之间。 其次，太赫兹光通过一个锋利的金属尖端照射，这增强了显微镜向纳米长度尺度的能力。“通常情况下，如果你有光波，你看不到小于你使用的光波长的东西。对于这种太赫兹光来说，波长大约是一毫米，所以它相当大，”金解释说。 “但在这里，我们使用了这个尖锐的金属尖端，其顶点被锐化到20纳米半径曲率，这就像我们的天线一样，可以看到比我们使用的波长更小的东西。”使用这种新显微镜，该团队研究了一种钙钛矿材料MapBi3，它最近成为科学家们感兴趣的太阳能电池中硅的替代品。 钙钛矿是一种特殊类型的半导体，当它暴露在可见光下时，它可以传输电荷。 在太阳能电池中使用MapBi3的主要挑战是，当它暴露在热和潮湿等元素中时，它很容易降解。根据王和金的说法，团队希望MapBi3在太赫兹光下表现得像绝缘体。 由于在样本上收集的数据是当材料暴露在太赫兹波中时光如何散射的读数，他们预计整个材料都有一致的低水平光散射。 然而，他们发现，沿着颗粒之间的边界，光散射有很大的变化。金解释说，导电材料，如金属，会有很高的光散射水平，而导电较少的材料，如绝缘体，不会有那么大的光散射水平。 在MapBi3中，沿晶界检测到的光散射的广泛变化揭示了材料的降解问题。在一周的时间里，研究小组继续收集材料的数据，在此期间收集的数据通过光散射水平的变化显示了降解过程。 这些信息可能有助于未来改进和操纵材料。“我们相信，目前的研究展示了一种强大的显微镜工具，可以直观、理解并潜在地减轻晶界退化、缺陷陷阱和材料退化，”王说。 “对这些问题的更好理解可能有助于在未来许多年开发高效的钙钛矿基光伏器件。”MAPBI3样品由托莱多大学提供。 这项研究在由Richard H.J.Kim,Zhaou Liu,Chuankun Huang,Joong-Mok Park,Samuel J.Haeuser,Zhaoning Song,Yanfa Yano,Yong Xin Yao,Liang Lo和JiGang Wang撰写并发表在ACS Photonics上的论文“钙钛矿太阳能电池材料的太赫兹纳米成像”中得到了进一步的讨论。
content_en: New discoveries made about a promising solar cell material, thanks to new microscopeA team of scientists from the Department of Energy's Ames National Laboratory has developed a new characterization tool that allowed them to gain unique insight into a possible alternative material for solar cells. Under the leadership of Jigang Wang, senior scientist from Ames Lab, the team developed a microscope that uses terahertz waves to collect data on material samples. The team then used their microscope to explore methylammonium lead iodide (MAPbI3) perovskite, a material that could potentially replace silicon in solar cells.Richard Kim, a scientist from Ames Lab, explained the two features that make the new scanning probe microscope unique. First, the microscope uses the terahertz range of electromagnetic frequencies to collect data on materials. This range is far below the visible light spectrum, falling between the infrared and microwave frequencies. Secondly, the terahertz light is shined through a sharp metallic tip that enhances the microscope's capabilities toward nanometer length scales."Normally if you have a light wave, you cannot see things smaller than the wavelength of the light you're using. And for this terahertz light, the wavelength is about a millimeter, so it's quite large," explained Kim. "But here we used this sharp metallic tip with an apex that is sharpened to a 20-nanometer radius curvature, and this acts as our antenna to see things smaller than the wavelength that we were using."Using this new microscope, the team investigated a perovskite material, MAPbI3, that has recently become of interest to scientists as an alternative to silicon in solar cells. Perovskites are a special type of semiconductor that transports an electric charge when it is exposed to visible light. The main challenge to using MAPbI3 in solar cells is that it degrades easily when exposed to elements like heat and moisture.According to Wang and Kim, the team expected MAPbI3 to behave like an insulator when they exposed it to the terahertz light. Since the data collected on a sample is a reading of how the light scatters when the material is exposed to the terahertz waves, they expected a consistent low-level of light-scatter throughout the material. What they found, however, was that there was a lot of variation in light scattering along the boundary between the grains.Kim explained that conductive materials, like metals, would have a high level of light scattering, while less conductive materials like insulators would not have as much. The wide variation of light scattering detected along the grain boundaries in MAPbI3 sheds light on the material's degradation problem.Over the course of a week, the team continued to collect data on the material, and data collected in that time showed the degradation process through changes in the levels of light scatterings. This information can be useful for improving and manipulating the material in the future."We believe that the present study demonstrates a powerful microscopy tool to visualize, understand and potentially mitigate grain boundary degradation, defect traps, and materials degradation," said Wang. "Better understanding of these issues may enable developing highly efficient perovskite-based photovoltaic devices for many years to come."The samples of MAPbI3 were provided by the University of Toledo. This research is further discussed in the paper "Terahertz Nanoimaging of Perovskite Solar Cell Materials," written by Richard H. J. Kim, Zhaoyu Liu, Chuankun Huang, Joong-Mok Park, Samuel J. Haeuser, Zhaoning Song, Yanfa Yan, Yongxin Yao, Liang Luo, and Jigang Wang, and published in the ACS Photonics.
abstract: 近日，由美国能源部能艾姆斯国家实验室领导的研究团队研发出一种使用太赫兹光收集材料样本数据的新型扫描探针显微镜。这种新型显微镜有两个独特之处。除了使用太赫兹频段电磁波收集材料数据之外，还可以直接通过尖锐金属尖端成像，增强了显微镜检测纳米级材料的能力。为检验显微镜的性能，研究人员使用新显微镜对甲基铵碘化铅（MAPbI3）钙钛矿材料进行了研究，这种材料有可能会取代硅成为生产未来太阳能电池的主流材料。研究人员首先推测将MAPbI3材料暴露于太赫兹光后，材料会表现出绝缘体特征。由于样本收集的数据是材料暴露于太赫兹波时光散射的读数，所以研究人员预计整个材料的光散射水平会保持一致。然而，实验结果表明，沿着材料颗粒间的边界，光散射发生了很大变化，且这些变化显示出材料的降解过程。这些信息对于将来改进和运用材料非常有帮助。新技术为开发强大的显微镜系统提供了新的方案，为未来高性能钙钛矿基光伏器件的开发奠定了研究基础。

title: 以色列研发出能针对性摧毁癌症肿瘤的新技术
keyword: 摧毁癌症肿瘤 非侵入性 纳米气泡 低频超声波 靶向
content_zh: 超声和纳米气泡的结合可以在没有侵入性治疗的情况下摧毁癌症肿瘤。特拉维夫大学开发的新技术使通过超声和纳米气泡注射到血液中的结合以有针对性的方式摧毁癌症肿瘤成为可能。 研究团队表示，与侵入性治疗方法或向肿瘤本身注射微泡不同，这项最新技术能够以非侵入性方式破坏肿瘤。 这项研究是在特拉维夫大学生物医学工程系Tali Ilovitsh博士实验室的博士生Mike Bismuth的领导下，与病理学系的Dov Hershkovitz博士合作进行的。 克利夫兰凯斯西储大学的阿加塔·埃克斯纳教授也参与了这项研究。 这项研究发表在《纳米科学》杂志上 Tali Ilovitsh说，他们的“新技术使得以相对简单的方式将纳米气泡注射到血液中成为可能，然后这些气泡聚集在癌性肿瘤的区域。之后，使用低频超声波，我们爆炸纳米气泡，从而爆炸肿瘤。”研究人员解释说，今天流行的癌症治疗方法是手术切除肿瘤，结合化疗和免疫治疗等补充治疗。 超声治疗肿瘤是一种非侵入性的手术替代方法，它既有优点也有缺点。 一方面，它允许本地化和聚焦治疗； 高强度超声波的使用可以产生热效应或机械效应，通过将强大的声能以高的时空精度传递到焦点。 这种方法已经被用来有效地治疗体内深处的实体瘤。 而且，它使治疗不适合进行肿瘤切除手术的病人成为可能。 然而，缺点是高温和高强度的超声波可能会损害肿瘤附近的组织。在目前的研究中，Ilovitsh博士和她的团队试图克服这个问题。 在使用动物模型的实验中，研究人员能够通过将纳米气泡注射到血液中（与迄今为止的做法相反，即将微气泡局部注射到肿瘤本身），结合低频超声波来摧毁肿瘤，偏离目标的效果最小 Ilovitsh说，“纳米气泡和低频超声波的结合提供了对肿瘤区域更具体的靶向性，并减少了脱靶毒性。 即使在低压下，对纳米气泡施加低频也会导致其极度膨胀和爆炸。 这使得在低压阈值下进行肿瘤的机械破坏成为可能。 我们的方法具有超声的优势，因为它是安全的、成本有效的和临床可用的，此外，纳米气泡的使用有助于肿瘤的靶向性，因为它们可以在超声成像的帮助下观察。“Ilovitsh博士补充说，低频超声的使用还增加了穿透深度，最大限度地减少扭曲和衰减，并扩大了焦点。”这有助于治疗位于身体深处的肿瘤，此外还有助于治疗更大体积的肿瘤。 这项实验是在乳腺癌肿瘤小鼠模型中进行的，但这种治疗可能对其他类型的肿瘤也有效，将来也对人类有效。“Ramot首席执行官Keren Primor Cohen补充说，”Ramot-Telaviv大学技术转让公司申请了几项专利来保护这项技术及其应用。 我们相信这项突破性技术在癌症治疗方面的商业潜力，我们正在与以色列国内外的几家领先公司进行接触，以推广它。“
content_en: A combination of ultrasound and nanobubbles allows cancerous tumors to be destroyed without invasive treatmentsA new technology developed at Tel Aviv University makes it possible to destroy cancerous tumors in a targeted manner, via a combination of ultrasound and the injection of nanobubbles into the bloodstream. According to the research team, unlike invasive treatment methods or the injection of microbubbles into the tumor itself, this latest technology enables the destruction of the tumor in a non-invasive manner. The study was conducted under the leadership of doctoral student Mike Bismuth from the lab of Dr. Tali Ilovitsh at Tel Aviv University's Department of Biomedical Engineering, in collaboration with Dr. Dov Hershkovitz of the Department of Pathology. Prof. Agata Exner from Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland also participated in the study. The study was published in the journal Nanoscale.Dr. Tali Ilovitsh says that their "new technology makes it possible, in a relatively simple way, to inject nanobubbles into the bloodstream, which then congregate in the area of the cancerous tumor. After that, using a low-frequency ultrasound, we explode the nanobubbles, and thereby the tumor."The researchers explain that the prevalent method of cancer treatment today is surgical removal of the tumor in combination with complementary treatments such as chemotherapy and immunotherapy. Therapeutic ultrasound to destroy the cancerous tumor is a non-invasive alternative to surgery.This method has both advantages and disadvantages. On the one hand, it allows for localized and focused treatment; the use of high-intensity ultrasound can produce thermal or mechanical effects by delivering powerful acoustic energy to a focal point with high spatial-temporal precision. This method has been used to effectively treat solid tumors deep within in the body. Moreover, it makes it possible to treat patients who are unfit for tumor resection surgery. The disadvantage, however, is that the heat and high intensity of the ultrasound waves may damage the tissues near the tumor.In the current study, Dr. Ilovitsh and her team sought to overcome this problem. In the experiment, which used an animal model, the researchers were able to destroy the tumor by injecting nanobubbles into the bloodstream (as opposed to what has been until now, which is the local injection of microbubbles into the tumor itself), in combination with low-frequency ultrasound waves, with minimal off-target effects.Dr. Ilovitsh says that "The combination of nanobubbles and low frequency ultrasound waves provides a more specific targeting of the area of the tumor, and reduces off-target toxicity. Applying the low frequency to the nanobubbles causes their extreme swelling and explosion, even at low pressures. This makes it possible to perform the mechanical destruction of the tumors at low-pressure thresholds. Our method has the advantages of ultrasound, in that it is safe, cost-effective, and clinically available, and in addition, the use of nanobubbles facilitates the targeting of tumors because they can be observed with the help of ultrasound imaging."Dr. Ilovitsh adds that the use of low-frequency ultrasound also increases the depth of penetration, minimizes distortion and attenuation, and enlarges the focal point. "This can help in the treatment of tumors that are located deep with the body, and in addition facilitate the treatment of larger tumor volumes. The experiment was conducted in a breast cancer tumor mouse model, but it is likely that the treatment will also be effective with other types of tumors, and in the future, also in humans."Keren Primor Cohen, CEO of Ramot, adds that "Ramot—Tel Aviv University Tech Transfer Company, applied for several patents to protect this technology and its application. We believe in the commercial potential of this breakthrough technology in cancer treatment, and we are in contact with several leading companies in Israel and abroad to promote it."
abstract: 近日，以色列特拉维夫大学研究团队研发出一项能有针对性摧毁癌症肿瘤的新技术。当今癌症治疗的流行方法是手术切除肿瘤，并结合化疗和免疫疗法等补充治疗。用于破坏癌性肿瘤的治疗性超声波是外科手术的非侵入性替代方案。然而，缺点是超声波的热量和高强度可能损伤肿瘤附近的组织。在这项新研究中，研究人员彻底解决了这一问题。他们将纳米气泡注射到血液中，然后使这些纳米气泡聚集在癌症肿瘤附近区域。之后，使用低频超声波诱发纳米气泡爆炸，使肿瘤破裂，最终达到治疗癌症的目的。研究人员表示，纳米气泡和低频超声波的结合为肿瘤区域提供了更清晰的靶向，减少了脱靶毒性。此外，低频超声波的使用也增加了穿透深度，最大限度减少了失真和衰减，并扩大了焦点，这不仅有助于治疗位于身体深处的癌症肿瘤，还有助于治疗体积较大的肿瘤。

title: 韩国实现对量子电池充电性的严格控制
keyword: 量子电池 量子力学 电磁场 量子位
content_zh: 新型稳定的量子电池可以可靠地将能量存储到电磁场中。量子计算机为解决经典计算机无法解决的计算问题提供了潜力。 例如，加拿大Xanadu公司最近声称，其量子计算机能够在36微秒内解决使用最先进的超级计算机需要9000年才能完成的计算任务。然而，量子技术需要能量来运行。 这一简单的考虑导致研究人员发展了量子电池的想法，量子电池是用作能量存储设备的量子力学系统。 最近，韩国基础科学研究所(IBS)复杂系统理论物理中心(PCS)的研究人员能够对量子电池的可能充电性能进行严格限制。具体地说，他们表明，与经典充电协议相比，收集量子电池可以大大提高充电速度。 这要归功于量子效应，它允许量子电池中的电池同时充电。尽管理论上取得了这些成就，但量子电池的实验实现仍然很少。 最近唯一值得注意的反例是利用两能级系统（与刚才介绍的量子比特非常相似）来存储能量，能量是由电磁场（激光）提供的。鉴于目前的情况，寻找新的、更容易获得的量子平台来用作量子电池显然是至关重要的。 出于这种动机，来自同一IBS PCS团队的研究人员与Giuliano Benenti（意大利Insubria大学）合作，最近决定重新审视一个过去被大量研究的量子力学系统：微脉塞。微脉塞是一种使用原子束将光子泵入腔体的系统。 简单地说，微脉泽可以被看作是上述量子电池实验模型的镜面结构：能量被存储到电磁场中，由一系列量子比特与电磁场依次相互作用而充电。IBS PCS的研究人员和他们的合作者表明，微脉泽具有可以作为量子电池的优良模型的特征。 当试图使用电磁场来储存能量时，一个主要的关注点是，从原理上讲，电磁场可以吸收大量的能量，可能远远超过所需的能量。 与一个简单的情况做一个类比，这将相当于一个手机电池，当插上电源时，它的电量会无限期地增加。 在这种情况下，忘记手机已经插上电源可能是极其危险的，因为没有停止充电的机制。幸运的是，该团队的数值结果表明，这种情况不可能发生在微型计算机上。 电磁场很快达到一个最终的构型（技术上称为稳态），其能量可以在建立微脉泽时先验地确定。 这种特性确保了对过度充电风险的保护。此外，研究人员表明，电磁场的最终配置处于纯状态，这意味着它不会带来充电期间使用的量子比特的记忆。 后一种性质在处理量子电池时尤为关键。 它保证了电池中储存的所有能量可以随时提取和使用，而不需要跟踪充电过程中使用的量子比特。最后，实验表明这些吸引人的特征是鲁棒的，并且不会通过改变本研究定义的特定参数来破坏这些特征。 在试图建造一个真正的量子电池时，这种特性显然很重要，因为建造过程中的缺陷是不可避免的。有趣的是，在一系列平行的论文中，Stefan Nimmrichter和他的合作者已经表明，量子效应可以使微脉泽的充电过程比经典充电更快。 也就是说，他们已经能够在微脉泽电池充电过程中显示出前面提到的量子优势，所有这些结果都表明微脉泽可以被认为是一个有希望的新平台，可以用来构建量子电池。 事实上，这些系统已经在实验中实现了很多年，这可能会极大地促进构建新的可访问的量子攻击原型。为此，IBS PCS的研究人员和朱利亚诺·贝内蒂目前正在与斯特凡·尼姆里希特及其合作者开始联合合作，进一步探索这些有希望的模型。 希望这项新的研究合作将最终能够基准和实验测试
content_en: New stable quantum batteries can reliably store energy into electromagnetic fieldsQuantum computers offer the potential to solve computational problems that are beyond the reach of classical computers. As an example, the Canadian company Xanadu recently claimed that its quantum computer has been able to solve, in just 36 microseconds, a computational task that would have required 9,000 years using state-of-the-art supercomputers.However, quantum technologies need energy to operate. This simple consideration has led researchers to develop the idea of quantum batteries, which are quantum mechanical systems used as energy storage devices. Recently, researchers at the Center for Theoretical Physics of Complex Systems (PCS) within the Institute for Basic Science (IBS), South Korea have been able to put tight constraints on the possible charging performance of a quantum battery.Specifically, they showed that a collection of quantum batteries can lead to an enormous improvement in charging speed compared to a classical charging protocol. This is thanks to quantum effects, which allow the cells in quantum batteries to be charged simultaneously.Despite these theoretical achievements, the experimental realizations of quantum batteries are still scarce. The only recent notable counter-example used a collection of two-level systems (very similar to the qubits just introduced) for energy storage purposes, with the energy being provided by an electromagnetic field (a laser).Given the current situation, it is clearly of uttermost importance to find new and more accessible quantum platforms which can be used as quantum batteries. With this motivation in mind, researchers from the same IBS PCS team, working in collaboration with Giuliano Benenti (University of Insubria, Italy), recently decided to revisit a quantum mechanical system that has been studied heavily in the past: the micromaser.Micromaser is a system where a beam of atoms is used to pump photons into a cavity. Put in simple terms, a micromaser can be thought of as a configuration specular to the experimental model of quantum battery mentioned above: the energy is stored into the electromagnetic field, which is charged by a stream of qubits sequentially interacting with it.The IBS PCS researchers and their collaborator showed that micromasers have features that allow them to serve as excellent models of quantum batteries. One of the main concerns when trying to use an electromagnetic field to store energy is that in principle, the electromagnetic field could absorb an enormous amount of energy, potentially much more than what is necessary. Making an analogy with a simple case, this would correspond to a phone battery that, when plugged, continues to increase its charge indefinitely. In such a scenario, forgetting that the phone is plugged in could be extremely risky, since there would be no mechanism to stop the charging.Luckily, the team's numerical results show that this cannot happen in micromasers. The electromagnetic field reaches quickly a final configuration (technically called a steady state), whose energy can be determined and decided a priori when building the micromaser. This property ensures protection from the risks of overcharging.In addition, the researchers showed that the final configuration of the electromagnetic field is in a pure state, which means that it brings no memory of the qubits that have been used during the charging. This latter property is particularly crucial when dealing with a quantum battery. It ensures that all the energy stored in the battery can be extracted and used whenever necessary, without the need of keeping track of the qubits used during the charging process.Finally, it was shown that these appealing features are robust and are not destroyed by changing the specific parameters defined in this study. This property is of clear importance when trying to build an actual quantum battery since imperfections in the building process are simply unavoidable.Interestingly, in a parallel series of papers, Stefan Nimmrichter and his collaborators have shown that quantum effects can make the charging process of the micromaser faster than classical charging. In other words, they have been able to show the presence of the previously mentioned quantum advantage during the charging of a micromaser battery.All these results suggest that micromaser could be considered as a promising new platform that can be used to build quantum batteries. The fact that these systems have been already implemented in experimental realizations for many years could give a serious boost in building new accessible prototypes of quantum batteries.To this end, the IBS PCS researchers and Giuliano Benenti are currently starting a joint collaboration with Stefan Nimmrichter and his collaborators, to further explore these promising models. The hope is that this new research collaboration will finally be able to benchmark and experimentally test the performances of micromaser-based quantum battery devices.The research was published in Quantum Science and Technology.
abstract: 近日，韩国基础科学研究所的研究人员实现了对量子电池充电性的控制。量子计算机能够解决经典计算机无法解决的计算问题，然而对量子技术中使用的量子电池进行充电控制一直是一个非常棘手的问题。为此，研究人员开发出一种能够控制量子电池充电的量子力学系统micro maser。micro maser是一种用原子束将光子泵入空腔的系统。在这个系统中能量被储存在电磁场中，主要通过一串量子位序列与之相互作用而带电。这种充电技术不仅可以确保量子电池不会发生过度充电，而且它还能够确保存储在电池中的所有能量在任何需要的时候被提取和使用，而无需跟踪充电过程中使用的量子位。该研究成果将会极大推动新型量子电池模型的建立。

title: 日本开发出制造柔性电子电路的新方法
keyword: 阈值电压 聚合物膜 柔性电子电路
content_zh: 下一代超柔性电子电路的简易制造柔性半导体是未来可穿戴电子技术的关键，但很难集成到复杂的架构中。 现在，在最近发表在《先进电子材料》上的一项研究中，来自日本的研究人员开发了一种为先进电路制造高质量软半导体的简单方法。现代集成电路技术依赖于被称为互补金属氧化物半导体(CMOS)电路的基本元件。 硅是大多数现代CMOS技术的半导体元件。 然而，由于未来的CMOS电路必须（例如）塑造成身体的形状或集成到衣服上，许多工作集中在开发软的、柔性的、基于聚合物的半导体上。要将这些半导体，尤其是流动电子的n型半导体集成到CMOS电路中，必须克服几个技术挑战。 例如，制备高质量的逐层结构--对CMOS器件功能很重要--往往相当缓慢和具有挑战性。 解决这些挑战是奈良科学技术研究所(NAIST)的研究人员试图解决的问题。“理想情况下，人们可以将聚合物薄膜沉积到液体基底上，以便于转移到任何其他基底上，”主要作者曼尼什·潘迪解释道。 “与传统的溶液处理相比，我们的策略对所产生的半导体薄膜的形态进行了优越的控制，这对电学性能至关重要。”这项工作基于单向浮动薄膜转移。 通过使用不溶解聚合物的液体基材，溶剂溶解的聚合物可以以形成一维浮动聚合物膜的方式滴加到基材上。 当溶剂蒸发时，聚合物分子的取向垂直于薄膜的长度方向。 这种分子形态优化了聚合物膜的电性能。 一旦薄膜固化，人们就可以很容易地将其转移到另一个衬底上--例如，进行逐层沉积。资深作者Masakazu Nakamura说：“我们制备了一种N沟道晶体管，几乎没有阈值电压，这对保持电源效率很重要。” “通过使用我们的方法，将n沟道和p沟道晶体管制备和集成到一个基于柔性半导体的器件中应该很简单。”这项工作成功地以廉价且易于复制的方式制备了一维聚合物基半导体薄膜。 NAIST研究人员的聚合物薄膜组装方法将有助于推进柔性电子的前景，并有助于在即将到来的可穿戴CMOS技术中找到硅的替代品。
content_en: Easy fabrication of next-generation, super-flexible electronic circuitsFlexible semiconductors are essential for future wearable electronics technologies, but have been difficult to integrate into complex architectures. Now, in a study recently published in Advanced Electronic Materials, researchers from Japan have developed a straightforward means of fabricating high-quality soft semiconductors for advanced electrical circuits.Modern integrated circuit technology depends on basic elements known as complementary metal oxide semiconductor (CMOS) circuits. Silicon is the semiconductor component of most modern CMOS technology. However, because future CMOS circuits must (for example) mold to the shape of a body or integrate into clothing, much work has focused on developing soft, flexible, polymer-based semiconductors.Several technical challenges must be overcome to integrate such semiconductors, especially n-type ones which flows electrons, into CMOS circuits. For example, preparing high-quality, layer-by-layer structures—important for CMOS device functionality—tends to be rather slow and challenging. Solving these challenges is the problem that researchers from Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST) sought to address."Ideally, one would be able to deposit polymer films onto liquid substrates for ease of transfer to any other substrate," explains Manish Pandey, lead author. "Our strategy offers superior control over the resulting semiconductor film morphology, which is critical to the electrical properties, compared with conventional solution processing."This work is based on unidirectional floating film transfer. By using a liquid substrate that does not dissolve the polymer, a solvent-dissolved polymer can be added dropwise onto the substrate, in a manner that forms a one-dimensional floating polymer film. Upon evaporation of the solvent, the polymer molecules orient perpendicular to the length direction of the film. This molecular morphology optimizes the electrical properties of the polymer film. Once the film solidifies, one can easily transfer it onto another substrate—e.g., for layer-by-layer deposition."We prepared an n-channel transistor that exhibited nearly no threshold voltage, which is important for maintaining power efficiency," says Masakazu Nakamura, senior author. "By using our approach, preparing and integrating n-channel as well as p-channel transistors into one devicebased on flexible semiconductors—should be straightforward."This work succeeded in preparing one-dimensional, polymer-based semiconductor films in an inexpensive manner that is straightforward to replicate. The NAIST researchers' polymer film assembly methodology will be useful for advancing the prospects of flexible electronics, and helping to find replacements for silicon in upcoming wearable CMOS technology.
abstract: 近日，日本奈良科学技术研究所 (NAIST) 开发出制造柔性电子电路的新方法。柔性电子电路需要达到满足于塑造成身体的形状或集成到衣服中，但在设计和制造阶段会遇到诸多挑战。为此，研究人员将溶剂溶解的一维聚合物膜转移到不溶解聚合物的液体基材上，溶剂蒸发后，实现聚合物分子垂直于薄膜的长度方向取向，优化了聚合物薄膜的电性能。此外，研究人员还设计除了一种低阈值电压的n型沟道晶体管来保持电源效率。该方法可简单的将n型沟道和p型沟道晶体管制备并集成到一个基于柔性半导体的器件中。该研究为制造超柔性电子电路奠定了基础，有助于推进柔性电子产品的发展。

title: 沙特阿拉伯开发出高质量III族氮化物合金剥离技术
keyword: 氮化铟镓 外延层 紫外光电探测器 发光二极管
content_zh: 通过微腔辅助裂纹扩展的大规模高质量III-氮化物膜（Opto-Electronic Advances）研究了工程拉伸应力Ni层通过微腔辅助裂纹扩展的大规模高质量III-氮化物膜。本研究的主要目的是开发一种史无前例的大规模高质量III-氮化物合金剥离技术，用于半导体工业。 通常，InGaN基发光二极管(LED)的微米厚外延层在高温(>1000°C)下生长在超过100微米厚的蓝宝石衬底上。重要的一点是，不可避免地使用厚蓝宝石衬底导致了许多缺点，如绝缘性、低热导率、不柔性等。因此，生长在衬底上的LED薄层给器件应用特别是微LED显示器的发展带来了许多挑战。尽管这些缺点可以通过去除衬底来解决， 由于它具有很强的界面断裂韧性，具有混合共价-离子键，因此具有很大的挑战性。 本课题组的研究致力于大规模去除衬底，同时保持薄膜质量，以制备III-氮化物薄膜。简单地说，引入中间微腔层以减轻界面断裂韧性，并设计残余拉伸应力Ni层以获得足够的能量释放率，方便地从界面剥离GaN基层。 基于这种机械剥离技术，我们展示了大规模非掺杂GaN和绿色LED膜，并通过制作大规模剥离后的紫外(UV)光电探测器和垂直型绿色LED等光电器件来验证其质量。本文作者引入微腔辅助裂纹扩展技术来获得大规模高质量的III-氮化物膜。 纳米孔结构已经被用来作为模板生长高质量的GaN基层，如未掺杂GaN和绿色LED。 在高温过度生长过程中，纳米孔结构转变为微孔洞结构，微孔洞结构的关键作用主要是通过减小比表面积来减轻GaN原有的界面韧性。 降低的界面韧性称为有效界面韧性，可以通过调节表面孔隙率和纳米孔结构的深度来调节。 基于过度生长的目标层（未掺杂GaN和绿色LED）具有有效的界面韧性，我们使用了拉伸应力Ni层，称为Ni应力源，以提供足够的能量释放速率。 通过电镀Ni应力源获得的能量释放率与有效界面韧性相匹配，使微腔结构界面处的目标层易于剥离。在大规模剥离后，通过X射线衍射测量摇摆曲线来验证未掺杂GaN膜的质量。 此外，我们还展示了用剥离膜制造的垂直型紫外光电探测器和贪婪发光二极管。 器件显示出中等的电学和光学性能，这也证明了薄膜在大规模剥离后仍然保持了质量。
content_en: Large-scale high-quality III-nitride membranes through microcavity-assisted crack propagationA new publication from Opto-Electronic Advances discusses large-scale and high-quality III-nitride membranes through microcavity-assisted crack propagation by engineering tensile-stressed Ni layers.The main purpose of this research was to develop an unprecedented exfoliation technique of large-scale and high-quality III-nitride alloys for practical use in the semiconductor industry. In general, a micrometer thick epitaxial layer for InGaN-based light-emitting diodes (LEDs) are grown on more than hundred micrometer thick sapphire substrates at high temperature (> 1000 °C).An important point is that the inevitable use of the thick sapphire substrates has led to a lot of shortcomings such as the insulative property, low thermal conductivity, inflexibility, etc. Thus, the LED thin layers grown on the substrates lead to many challenges to develop device applications, especially micro-LED display.Although these drawbacks can be resolved by removing the substrates, it is challenging due to its strong interfacial fracture toughness with mixed covalent-ionic bonds. Our group's research has been dedicated to removing the substrates at large scale while maintaining the film quality for fabricating III-nitride membranes.Briefly, intermediate microcavity layers have been introduced to alleviate the interfacial fracture toughness, and the residual tensile-stressed Ni layers were engineered to achieve sufficient energy release rate to conveniently exfoliate the GaN-based layers from the interfaces. Based on this mechanical lift-off technique, we demonstrated large-scale undoped-GaN and green LED membranes and verified the quality by fabricating opto-electronic devices, such as ultraviolet (UV) photodetectors and vertical-type green LEDs after the large-scale exfoliation.The authors of this article introduce microcavity-assisted crack propagation to obtain large-scale and high-quality III-nitride membranes. Nanoporous structures have been fabricated to be used as a template to grow high-quality GaN-based layers such as undoped-GaN and green LEDs. During the high temperature overgrowth of the layers, the nanoporous structures were transformed into micro-size cavity structures.The key role for the micro-size cavity structures is primarily to alleviate the original interfacial toughness of GaN by reducing surface area. The reduced interfacial toughness, called the effective interfacial toughness, can be adjusted by modulating the surface porosity and the depth of nanoporous structures. Based on the overgrown target layers (undoped-GaN and green LEDs) with the effective interfacial toughness, we applied tensile-stressed Ni layers, callled a Ni stressor, to provide sufficient energy release rate. The target layers were easily exfoliated at the interfaces of microcavity structures by matching the energy release rate obtained from the Ni stressors, which is deposited by electroplating, to the effective interfacial toughness.After the large-scale exfoliation, the quality of the undoped-GaN membrane was verified by measuring rocking curves through X-ray diffraction. Moreover, we demonstrated vertical-type UV photodetectors and greed LEDs manufactured by the exfoliated membranes. The devices showed moderate electrical and optical performances, which could also prove that the quality of the thin films is preserved after the large-scale exfoliation.
abstract: 近日，沙特阿拉伯阿卜杜拉国王科技大学研究人员开发出大规模衬底剥离技术，可保证得到的III族氮化物薄膜具有高质量。通常，用于氮化铟镓基发光二极管的外延层是在超过100微米厚的蓝宝石衬底上生长出来的，较厚的蓝宝石衬底会导致许多缺陷的产生，造成器件热导率低、灵活性差等问题，因此科学家一直致力于开发全新的衬底剥离技术。为实现这一目标，研究人员引入了中间微腔层以减轻界面断裂韧性，并设计残余拉伸应力镍层以获得足够的能量释放率，降低从界面剥离氮化铟镓基的难度。在实现大规模剥离之后，研究人员利用X射线衍射技术测量摇摆曲线验证了未掺杂氮化镓膜的质量，并使用剥离薄膜制造出垂直型紫外光电探测器和发光二极管，这些器件显示出良好的电学和光学性能，这也证明在大规模剥离后薄膜的质量仍然非常高。

title: 英国开发出可提高卫星性能的超薄太阳能电池
keyword: 超薄太阳能电池 卫星 砷化镓 辐射
content_zh: 超薄太阳能电池有望改善卫星性能空间卫星是由光伏电池供电的，光伏电池可以将太阳光转化为电能。 暴露在轨道上的某些类型的辐射会损坏设备，降低它们的性能，限制它们的寿命。在《应用物理学杂志》上，剑桥大学的科学家提出了一种耐辐射的光伏电池设计，其特征是一层超薄的吸光材料。当太阳能电池吸收光时，它们将能量转移给材料中的负电荷电子。 这些电荷载流子被释放，并在光伏上产生电流。 空间辐照会使太阳能电池材料中的原子发生位移，减少载流子的寿命，从而造成损伤，降低效率。 使光伏电池变得更薄应该会增加它们的寿命，因为电荷载流子在它们缩短的寿命内可以走的路更少。随着低地球轨道越来越多地被卫星杂乱，使用中土轨道变得越来越有必要，比如穿过地球质子辐射带中心的莫尔尼娅轨道。 对于这些更高的轨道来说，需要设计耐辐射的细胞。耐辐射细胞的另一个应用是对其他行星和卫星的研究。 例如木星的卫星木卫二，其辐射环境是太阳系中最严峻的之一。 太阳能航天器在木卫二着陆需要耐辐射设备。研究人员使用半导体砷化镓建造了两种类型的光伏设备。 一种是通过将几种物质分层在一个堆栈中构建的片上设计。 另一个设计包括一个银背镜，以增强对光的吸收。为了模拟太空辐射的影响，这些设备被英国道尔顿坎布赖恩核设施产生的质子轰击 利用阴极发光技术研究了光伏器件在辐照前后的性能，该技术可以测量辐照损伤的程度。 使用紧凑型太阳模拟器进行了第二组测试，以确定这些设备在被质子轰击后如何将太阳光转化为电能。“我们的超薄太阳能电池在超过一定阈值的质子辐射方面优于以前研究的更厚的设备。 与以前的观测相比，超薄几何结构提供了两个数量级的良好性能，“作者阿明·巴特尔说。作者说，这些超薄电池性能的提高是因为电荷载流子寿命足够长，可以在器件中的端子之间传播。与更厚的电池相比，超薄电池在运行20年后提供相同功率所需的盖板玻璃减少了近3.5倍。 这将转化为更轻的负载和发射成本的显著降低。“超薄砷化镓太阳能电池中的辐射效应”一文由Armin Barthel、Larkin Sayre、Gunnar Kusch、Rachel A.Oliver和Louise C.Hirst撰写。 这篇文章将发表在2022年11月8日的《应用物理学杂志》上。
content_en: Ultrathin solar cells promise improved satellite performanceMost space satellites are powered by photovoltaic cells that convert sunlight to electricity. Exposure to certain types of radiation present in orbit can damage the devices, degrading their performance and limiting their lifetime.In the Journal of Applied Physics, scientists from the University of Cambridge proposed a radiation-tolerant photovoltaic cell design that features an ultrathin layer of light-absorbing material.When solar cells absorb light, they transfer its energy to negatively charged electrons in the material. These charge carriers are knocked free and generate a flow of electricity across the photovoltaic. Irradiation in space causes damage and lowers efficiency by displacing atoms in the solar cell material and reducing the lifetime of the charge carriers. Making photovoltaics thinner should increase their longevity because the charge carriers have less far to go during their shortened lifetimes.As low Earth orbit becomes more cluttered with satellites, it becomes increasingly necessary to use middle Earth orbits, such as the Molniya orbit that passes through the center of Earth's proton radiation belt. Radiation-tolerant cell designs will be needed for these higher orbits.Another application for radiation-tolerant cells is the study of other planets and moons. For example, Europa, a moon of Jupiter, has one of the most severe radiation environments in the solar system. Landing a solar-powered spacecraft on Europa will require radiation-tolerant devices.The investigators built two types of photovoltaic devices using the semiconductor gallium arsenide. One was an on-chip design built by layering several substances in a stack. The other design involved a silver back mirror to enhance light absorption.To mimic the effects of radiation in space, the devices were bombarded with protons generated at the Dalton Cumbrian Nuclear Facility in the U.K. The performance of the photovoltaic devices before and after irradiation was studied using a technique known as cathodoluminescence that can give a measure of the amount of radiation damage. A second set of tests using a Compact Solar Simulator were carried out to determine how well the devices converted sunlight to power after being bombarded with protons."Our ultra-thin solar cell outperforms the previously studied, thicker devices for proton radiation above a certain threshold. The ultra-thin geometries offer favorable performance by two orders of magnitude relative to previous observations," said author Armin Barthel.The authors said that the improved performance of these ultra-thin cells is because the charge carriers live long enough to travel between terminals in the device.Compared to thicker cells, nearly 3.5 times less cover glass is needed for the ultra-thin cells to deliver the same amount of power after 20 years of operation. This will translate to a lighter load and significant reduction in launch costs.The article "Radiation effects in ultra-thin GaAs solar cells" is authored by Armin Barthel, Larkin Sayre, Gunnar Kusch, Rachel A. Oliver, and Louise C. Hirst. The article will appear in Journal of Applied Physics on Nov. 8, 2022.
abstract: 近日，英国剑桥大学科学家提出了一种抗辐射的光伏电池设计方案，其最大的特点是引入了超薄吸光材料层。研究人员利用半导体砷化镓吸光材料制造出两种类型的光伏器件，一种采用片上设计，将几种材料层叠加，另一个种设计利用一个银色镜子增强光吸收效率。为模拟太空中的辐射环境效应，这些器件经受了英国道尔顿坎布里亚核设施质子的轰击，然后研究人员使用阴极发光技术研究了辐射照射前后光伏器件的性能及损伤程度，然后使用小型太阳模拟器测试了器件在被质子轰击后的光电转换效率。结果表明，新开发的超薄太阳能电池的性能优于现有太阳能电池。与较厚的太阳能电池相比，超薄太阳能电池在运行20年后还能提供相同功率，且所需的覆盖玻璃减少了近3.5倍。该研究成果将有望大幅降低卫星供电太阳能电池的制造成本。

title: 英国开发出利用纳米材料一步处理废水中亚砷酸盐的新方法
keyword: 净化砷 X射线 光催化 氧化 吸附 一步水处理方法
content_zh: 由Dominik Weiss教授领导的伦敦帝国理工学院研究小组一直在与英国国家同步加速器金刚石光源合作开发一种新材料(TiO2/Fe2O3纳米材料），将光催化氧化和吸附结合起来，可以一步处理受污染的水。南亚超过5000万人暴露在被致癌砷污染的地下水中。 该团队的结果最近发表在《表面和界面的结果》上，概述了钻石B18波束线的高度通用性如何使他们能够对样本进行X射线吸收光谱检查，并将结果与他们的预测模型进行比较。研究人员已经拥有这种砷净化材料的专利，他们希望这种新材料可以被纳入受影响家庭日常使用的过滤柱，因为这种廉价高效的技术可以改善数百万人的水质。 该出版物的第一作者杰伊·布伦博士解释说：“这些实验使我们能够直接研究砷与我们的TiO2/Fe2O3纳米材料结合时形成的表面复合物的结构。 我们能够得出结论，我们为我们的预测表面络合模型选择的表面络合物，使用纯二氧化钛和纯氧化铁标准物质，是合适的。“”然而，我们在EXAFS数据中也看到了一些三齿As-Fe2O3键，这是我们早期模型中没有包括的。 我们还能够证实As(iii)在低pH值下的表面沉淀，这是我们的模型预测的。“砷是一种著名的有毒元素，长期暴露在即使是微量的环境中也会导致衰弱和潜在的致命疾病，包括皮肤癌、肺癌、角化病和神经疾病。 据信，全球有1亿至2亿人通过受污染的地下水饮用水接触砷。 去除水中砷的多步处理已经存在，使用过滤（吸附），但这一过程需要预处理（氧化）才能有效。 杰·布伦说：“我们想更好地理解吸附在这种复合TiO2/Fe2O3纳米材料上的砷的性质； 了解砷是否以与纯TiO2和纯Fe2O3矿物相同的方式结合。“”X射线吸收光谱(XAS)是做到这一点的完美方法，通过EXAFS揭示了砷原子的局部环境信息，例如砷与TiO2/Fe2O3表面形成了多少共价键。 我们获得的波束时间资助使我们能够在钻石光源实现这些实验。“光谱观察证实了一个预测模型砷可以在水中以几种形式存在，包括亚砷酸盐和砷酸盐。 砷酸盐（即As(iii)）离子由于含有中性电荷(H3AsO3)，很难用吸附或混凝等常规处理方法从污染水体中去除。 与此相反，砷酸盐（即As(V)）离子(HaSO42-和H2AsO4-)比H3AsO3更容易被吸附，毒性更小。因此，在通过吸附去除As(iii)之前，将As(iii)氧化为As(v)有利于处理受As(iii)污染的水。 As(iii)的氧化可以使用多相光催化剂如TiO2和紫外(UV)辐射来实现。 然而，其他材料如氧化铁(Fe2O3)的吸附效率更高。 因此，目前采用多步处理装置，但它们的设计和维护是一个挑战，这一困难可以通过将光催化和吸附能力结合到单一材料中来克服。 作者随后发展了表面络合模型(SCM)来预测砷的吸附量及其形态随实验变量如pH的变化。然而，作者希望验证模型所选择的吸附砷表面络合物的结构是否真实，因此他们使用了光谱技术。 X射线吸收光谱技术由于其元素选择性、区分As氧化态(XANES)和识别吸附在TiO2/Fe2O3表面的As络合物(EXAFS)结构的能力而发挥了关键作用，该团队使用B18实现了他们的实验。 在光束线上，他们能够记录固体样品的EXAFS光谱来确定砷与材料表面形成的共价键的数量，以及水悬浮液的XANES光谱来测量光氧化动力学。作者将在钻石光源(EXAFS)获得的光谱数据与伦敦帝国理工学院的FTIR和Zeta电位测量相结合
content_en: A single-step water treatment for arsenic decontaminationA team of researchers from Imperial College London led by Prof. Dominik Weiss has been working with Diamond Light Source, the UK's national synchrotron on a new material (TiO2/Fe2O3 nanomaterial) combining photocatalytic oxidation with adsorption, which allows a one-step treatment of contaminated water.Over 50 million people in South Asia are exposed to groundwater contaminated with carcinogenic arsenic. The team's results were recently published in Results in Surfaces and Interfaces outlining how the high versality of Diamond's B18 beamline allowed them to perform X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy on their samples and compare the results with their predictive models.The researchers already have a patent for this material for arsenic decontamination and they hope that the new material might be incorporated into a filtration column for everyday use in affected households, as this cheap and efficient technology could improve the quality of water for millions of people. .First author of the publication, Dr. Jay Bullen explains, "These experiments allowed us to directly investigate the structure of the surface complexes formed when arsenic binds to our TiO2/Fe2O3 nanomaterial. We were able to conclude that the surface complexes we had chosen for our predictive surface complexation model, using pure titania and pure iron oxide reference materials, were appropriate.""However, we also saw some tridentate As-Fe2O3 bonding in the EXAFS data that wasn't included within our earlier model. We were also able to confirm surface precipitation of As(III) at low pH, which our model had predicted."Arsenic is a famously toxic element and long-term exposure to even trace amounts can lead to debilitating and potentially fatal diseases including skin cancer, lung cancer, keratosis, and neurological disorders. 100-200 million people globally are believed to be exposed to arsenic through contaminated groundwater drinking supplies. Water multi-step treatments to remove arsenic already exist, using filtration (adsorption), but this process requires pre-treatment (oxidation) to be efficient .Dr. Jay Bullen says, "We wanted to better understand the nature of arsenic adsorbed onto this composite TiO2/Fe2O3 nanomaterial; to understand whether arsenic binds in the same way as onto pure TiO2 and pure Fe2O3 minerals.""X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy (XAS) is the perfect way to do this, with EXAFS revealing information about the local environment of arsenic atoms, e.g. how many covalent bonds arsenic forms with the TiO2/Fe2O3 surface. The beamtime grant we received allowed us to realize these experiments at Diamond Lightsource."Spectroscopic observations to confirm a predictive modelArsenic can be found in several forms in water including arsenite and arsenate. Arsenite (i.e. As(III)) ions are difficult to remove from contaminated water using conventional treatments such as adsorption or coagulation-flocculation due to its neutral charge (H3AsO3). In contrast, arsenate (i.e. As(V)) ions (HAsO42- and H2AsO4-) are both (i) more easily adsorbed and (ii) less toxic than H3AsO3.Consequently, the treatment of As(III)-contaminated water benefits from the oxidation of As(III) to As(V) prior to its removal via adsorption. Oxidation of As(III) can be achieved using heterogeneous photocatalysts, such as TiO2, and ultraviolet (UV) radiation. However, other materials such as iron oxides (Fe2O3) are more efficient for adsorption. Therefore multiple-step treatment plants are currently used but their design and maintainance is challenging.This difficulty may be overcome by incorporating photocatalytic and adsorption capabilities into a single material. Previous studies by the same group showed that composite materials combining the excellent photocatalytic capabilities of TiO2 with the high As(V) adsorption capacities of iron oxides (Fe2O3) were good candidates for efficient decontamination.The authors subsequently developed a surface complexation model (SCM) to predict changes in the amount of arsenic adsorbed and its speciation as a function of experimental variables such as pH.However, the authors wanted to verify that the structures of the adsorbed arsenic surface complexes chosen for the model were realistic, so they used spectroscopic techniques. X-ray absorption spectroscopy played a key role thanks to its element selectivity, its capability to discriminate As oxidation state (XANES) and to identify the structure of the As complexes adsorbed on the TiO2/Fe2O3 surface (EXAFS).The team used B18 to realize their experiments. At the beamline, they were able to record EXAFS spectra of solid samples to determine how many covalent bonds arsenic forms with the surface of the materials, and XANES spectra of aqueous suspensions to measure photooxidation kinetics.The authors combined spectroscopic data obtained at Diamond Lightsource (EXAFS) with FTIR and zeta potential measurements at Imperial College London to develop a picture of the dominant surface complexes formed when arsenic is adsorbed by TiO2/Fe2O3 composite nanomaterials.This was used to evaluate and verify the speciation of adsorbed arsenic predicted by the authors' previous Surface Complexation Model (SCM), a theoretical model that is able to predict changes in adsorption as a function of environmental conditions. This model had been developed using surface complexes chosen based on data for pure titania and pure iron oxides, with experimental evidence for arsenic speciation on composite TiO2/Fe2O3 not being available prior to the Diamond Lightsource study.
abstract: 近日，英国伦敦帝国理工学院与英国钻石光源研究所使用基于二氧化钛和氧化铁的复合纳米材料来净化砷，并结合光催化、氧化和吸附原理，实现了对受污染废水的阶梯式处理。目前，已经存在的除砷多步废水处理方法，主要通过过滤（吸附作用）来实现，但该过程需要预处理（氧化）才能有效。研究人员通过X 射线吸收光谱来对传统方法进行了改进，开发出可用于净化砷的一步废水处理方法。其中，X射线吸收光谱的精细结构主要用于揭示砷原子的局部环境信息。在实验过程中，研究人员首先将废水中的亚砷酸盐（砷III）氧化为砷酸盐（砷V），这样可以使砷的毒性大大降低。然后，再通过将光催化和吸附能力结合到单一材料中来实现将砷从受污染废水中一步去除的目的。最后，研究人员还基于纯二氧化钛和纯氧化铁表面复合物数据，开发出可预测砷吸附量变化及其形态的表面络合物模型。该研究为净化废水中的砷提供了可靠有效的新方法，有望为复杂废水处理降低技术难度、节约成本。

title: 沙特开发出可以保护微电网免受网络攻击的设备
keyword: 太阳能控制器 电力网络 网络攻击 硬件性能计数器
content_zh: 抵御微电网攻击的简单硬件与太阳能电池板控制器集成的廉价硬件可以保护孤立的电网免受网络攻击。小规模可再生能源系统的一个优势是，在需要时，它们可以被安排成独立于主电网运行的网络。 现在，KAUST的研究人员正在开发巧妙的方法来保护这些被称为微电网的网络免受网络攻击。“微电网是小的‘电力岛'，可以在紧急情况下为关键服务提供电力，如医疗保健、食物和水，”Ioannis Zografopoulos解释说，他与KAUST的Charalambos Konstantinou和美国达拉斯德克萨斯大学的同事一起进行了这项研究。然而，微电网的相对简单和孤立使它们成为旨在扰乱社区的网络攻击的诱人目标。在他们改善微电网安全的最新努力中， 该团队使用硬件性能计数器--嵌入大多数计算机中的特殊寄存器来监控事件，例如某个命令被执行了多少次。“HPC最初用于分析目的或识别代码中的瓶颈，”Zografopoulos说。 “然而，我们已经利用HPC来检测表明在我们的设备上执行恶意代码的代码模式：特别是太阳能逆变器的嵌入式控制器，该控制器将太阳能光伏板的输出转换为消费者可用的电力。”出于成本原因，太阳能逆变器的控制器没有配备HPC。 Zografopoulos和他的同事开发了量身定制的HPC，能够监控逆变器内发生的命令，而不会干扰他们将太阳能转化为电力的主要工作。 至关重要的是，该团队通过包括时间序列分类器，增加了一层额外的安全性； 这些算法将潜在的恶意命令组合与HPC触发事件的时间顺序相关联。“我们可以通过在一个定制的HPC上训练的分类器以超过97%的准确率检测逆变器控制器中的恶意软件，”Zografopoulos说。 “这满足了我们低成本、低复杂度防御对策的最初目标。”该团队还模拟了对加拿大城市配电系统副本的恶意软件攻击，该系统包含四个基于逆变器的分布式发电机。 他们的HPC系统能够检测可能导致设备损坏或电力中断的电压、电流和频率不稳定。“我们研究的主要收获是，嵌入式控制器可以配备基于硬件的恶意软件检测机制，不会增加复杂性或需要额外的计算资源，”Zografopoulos说。 “KAUST的设施使我们能够在实验室使用实际的逆变器控制器评估我们的方法，并模拟网络攻击的潜在影响。”这些发现发表在《能源报告》上。
content_en: Simple hardware to defend against microgrid attacksAn inexpensive piece of hardware integrated with solar panel controllers can protect isolated power networks from cyberattacks.One advantage of small-scale renewable energy systems is that they can be arranged into networks that operate independently of the main electric grid when required. Now, researchers at KAUST are developing ingenious ways of protecting these networks, known as microgrids, from cyberattacks."Microgrids are small 'power islands' that can provide electricity for critical services, such as health care, food and water, during emergencies," explains Ioannis Zografopoulos, who conducted the research with Charalambos Konstantinou at KAUST and co-workers at the University of Texas at Dallas, U.S. However, the relative simplicity and isolation of microgrids makes them attractive targets for cyberattacks aimed at disrupting communities.In their latest efforts to improve microgrid security, the team employed hardware performance counters (HPCs)—special registers that are embedded within most computers to monitor events, such as how many times a certain command has been performed."HPCs were originally used for profiling purposes or to identify bottlenecks within code," says Zografopoulos. "However, we have utilized HPCs to detect code patterns that indicate the execution of malicious code on our devices: specifically, the embedded controllers of solar inverters that convert the output of solar photovoltaic panels into usable power for consumers."The controllers in solar inverters do not come equipped with HPCs, for cost reasons. Zografopoulos and co-workers developed tailor-made HPCs that were able to monitor the commands occurring within the inverters, without interfering in their main job of converting solar energy to electricity. Crucially, the team added an extra layer of security by including time series classifiers; these are algorithms that correlate potentially malicious combinations of commands with the time sequence of HPC firing events."We can detect malware in inverter controllers with over 97 percent accuracy using a classifier trained on just a single custom-built HPC," says Zografopoulos. "This meets our original objective for a low-cost and low-complexity defense countermeasure."The team also simulated malware attacks on a replica of the Canadian urban distribution system, containing four inverter-based distributed generators. Their HPC system was able to detect voltage, current and frequency instabilities that could lead to equipment damage or electricity interruptions."The main takeaway from our study is that embedded controllers can be equipped with hardware-based malware detection mechanisms (HPCs) that do not add complexity or require additional computational resources," says Zografopoulos. "The facilities at KAUST enabled us to evaluate our methodology in the lab using actual inverter controllers and simulate the potential impacts of cyberattacks."The findings are published in Energy Reports.
abstract: 近日，沙特阿卜杜拉国王科技大学研发出一种集成了太阳能电池板控制器的廉价设备，可以保护孤立的电力网络免受网络攻击。微电网是小型的“电力岛”，可以在紧急情况下为关键领域供电，如医疗保健、食物和水。然而，微电网相对简单和孤立，极易遭受网络攻击。为此，研究团队使用硬件性能计数器检测网络中出现的恶意代码，并转移至太阳能电池板控制器中，该控制器可以将太阳能光伏板的输出转换为消费者可用的电力。基于成本考虑，太阳能电池板控制器一般不会配备硬件性能计数器。于是研究团队开发了专用的硬件性能计数器设备，不仅能够监控控制器内部运行指令，而且不会干扰监控器正常运行。测试结果表明，专用的硬件性能计数器设备能以超过97%的准确率检测电池板控制器中的恶意软件。此外，在针对加拿大城市配电系统模型的网路攻击中，该系统能够检测到可能导致设备损坏或电力中断的不稳定电压、电流和频率。

title: 韩国开发出可提高锂离子电池性能的新技术
keyword: 电极锂离子电池双层阳极 离子传导性 高容量材料
content_zh: 提高性能的锂离子电池新电极设计韩国机械材料研究所(KIMM)宣布开发世界上第一个电池电极的设计和工艺技术，该电极显著提高了智能手机、笔记本电脑和电动汽车等电子设备中使用的电池的性能和稳定性。由KIMM纳米力学系首席研究员Seungmin Hyun领导的联合研究小组是科学和信通技术部管辖的机构， 和成均馆大学的Hoo-Jeong Lee教授开发了一种新的电池技术，该技术使用了一种电极（阳极）结构，提高了传统锂离子电池的可靠性和性能。他们的研究成果发表在《高级功能材料》杂志上。为了开发一种即使锂离子电池电极厚也能保持高性能和可靠性的设计和工艺技术，KIMM-SKKU联合研究团队组成了双层阳极。 此外，负极设计有凹槽，允许具有改进的离子导电性和导电性的小材料放置在高容量材料之间。通常，锂离子电池电极是通过涂覆和干燥浆料来制造的，以便它可以均匀地分布在整个电极上。 因此，浆料的均匀性决定了电池的性能。 电极越厚，能量密度和均匀性越低，难以在高功率环境下保持性能。然而，利用这种新开发的电池的阳极结构，即使电极很厚，也可以实现均匀的反应稳定性，同时保持整个电极的高能量密度。 这对提高电池的性能和寿命特别有帮助。首席研究员Seungmin Hyun表示，这项成果是通过将新的设计应用于传统锂离子电池材料和工艺来提高电池性能和寿命的有效方法。 他补充说，团队将继续努力将这项新技术应用于高功率环境下需要高能量密度的电动汽车和软机器人，以及商用智能手机和笔记本电脑等电子设备。
content_en: New electrode design for lithium-ion batteries that improves performanceKorea Institute of Machinery & Materials (KIMM) has announced the development of the design and process technology for the world's first battery electrode that significantly improves the performance and stability of batteries used in electronic devices such as smartphones, laptops, and electric vehicles.A joint research team led by principal researcher Seungmin Hyun of the Department of Nano-Mechanics at KIMM, an institution under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Science and ICT, and Professor Hoo-jeong Lee of Sungkyunkwan University have developed a new battery technology that uses an electrode (anode) structure that enhances the reliability and performance of traditional lithium-ion batteries.The results of their research achievement were published in the journal Advanced Functional Materials.In order to develop a design and process technology that maintains high performance and reliability even when the electrode of the lithium-ion battery is thick, the KIMM-SKKU joint research team formed a bi-layered anode. Additionally, the anode is designed with grooves allowing small materials with improved ion conductivity and electrical conductivity to be placed between high-capacity materials.In general, lithium-ion battery electrodes are manufactured by coating and drying a slurry so that it can be evenly distributed over the entire electrode. As such, it is the uniformity of the slurry that determines the performance of battery. The thicker the electrode, the lower the energy density and uniformity, making it difficult to maintain performance in a high-power environment.However, with the anode structure of this newly developed battery, uniform reaction stability can be achieved while maintaining high energy density throughout the electrode, even if the electrode is thick. This is particularly helpful in improving the performance and lifespan of batteries.Principal researcher Seungmin Hyun stated that this achievement is an efficient method to improve the performance and lifespan of batteries by applying a new design to traditional lithium-ion battery materials and processes. He added that the team will continue to make efforts to apply this new technology to electric vehicles and soft robots that require high energy density in high-power environments, as well as to electronic devices such as commercial smartphones and laptops.
abstract: 近日，韩国机械与材料研究所 (KIMM) 宣布开发出新的电池电极设计和工艺技术，可显著提高智能手机、笔记本电脑和电动汽车等电子设备的电池性能和稳定性。研究人员设计了一种新的电极结构，使在电池中形成了双层阳极，并在阳极设计凹槽，可将离子传导性和导电性小的材料放置在高容量材料之间。该设计的目的是实现即便在整个电极保持高能量密度的同时也能拥有均匀的反应稳定性，有助于提高电池的性能和寿命。未来，该项技术将被应用于高功率环境下需要高能量密度的电动汽车和软体机器人，以及商用智能手机和笔记本电脑等电子设备。

title: 美国研发出为可穿戴技术供电的MXene纺织电容器
keyword: MXene材料 纺织电容器 可编程微控制器 优化配置
content_zh: MXENE纺织超级电容器“贴片”为可穿戴技术提供动力德雷克塞尔大学的研究人员离可穿戴纺织技术成为现实又近了一步。 最近发表在《材料化学杂志》上的德雷塞尔工程学院的材料科学家与埃森哲实验室的一个团队合作，报告了一种柔性可穿戴超级电容器贴片的新设计。 它使用2011年在德雷克塞尔大学发现的一种材料Mxene，创造了一种基于纺织品的超级电容器，可以在几分钟内充电，并为Arduino微控制器温度传感器和近两个小时的数据无线电通信供电。“这是可穿戴技术的一个重大发展，”杰出大学博士、德雷克塞尔工程学院巴赫教授尤里·戈特西（Yury Gogotsi）说，他是这项研究的合著者。 “要将技术完全集成到织物中，我们还必须能够无缝集成其电源--我们的发明展示了纺织品储能设备的前进道路。”这项研究是与高戈茨的本科生和博士后、功能性织物中心教授兼主任吉纳维芙·迪翁（Genevieve Dion）以及加州埃森哲实验室的研究人员合著的，建立在以前的研究基础上，该研究着眼于MXENE功能化纺织品的耐久性、导电性和储能能力，这些研究并没有推动优化纺织品，为LED灯等无源设备之外的电子产品供电。 最新的工作表明，它不仅能够承受作为纺织品的严格要求，还可以存储和输送足够的电力，以运行可编程电子设备收集和传输环境数据数小时--这一进展可能使其用于医疗保健技术。“虽然有许多材料可以集成到纺织品中，但MXENE与其他材料相比具有明显的优势，因为它具有天然的导电性，并能够作为稳定的胶体溶液分散在水中。 德雷克塞尔工程学院的博士研究员兼合著者Tetiana Hryhorchuk说：“这意味着纺织品可以很容易地涂上MXene，而不需要使用化学添加剂和额外的生产步骤来使MXene粘附在织物上。” “因此，我们的超级电容器显示出高能量密度，并实现了功能应用，如为可编程电子设备供电，这是将基于纺织品的能量存储应用到现实生活中所需的。”Drexel的研究人员一直在探索将MXENE（一种导电的二维纳米材料）作为一种涂层的可能性，这种涂层可以渗透多种材料，具有优异的导电性、耐久性、抗电磁辐射性和能量存储性。最近，该团队研究了使用导电MXENE纱来制造感知和响应温度、运动和压力的纺织品的方法。 但为了将这些织物设备完全集成为“可穿戴设备”，研究人员还需要找到一种将电源编织到混合材料中的方法。研究团队写道：“由于当前可用材料和技术的性能指标不足，迄今为止，大多数电子纺织品系统仍然缺少灵活、可伸展和真正纺织级的储能平台。” “以前的研究报告称，有足够的机械强度来承受工业针织。然而，演示的应用只包括简单的设备。”该团队开始设计MXENE纺织超级电容器贴片，目标是在使用最少的活性材料和占用最少的空间的同时，最大限度地提高能量存储能力--以降低生产的总体成本，并保持服装的灵活性和耐磨性。为了制造超级电容器，该团队简单地将编织的棉纺织的小样本浸入MXENE溶液中，然后在氯化锂电解质凝胶上分层。 每个超级电容器电池由两层MXENE涂层纺织品和一个同样由棉纺织制成的电解质隔板组成。 为了制造一个足够供电的贴片来运行一些有用的设备--在这种情况下是Arduino可编程微控制器--该团队堆叠了五个电池，以创建一个能够充电到6伏特的电源包，与通常用于为高尔夫球车、电灯或跳跃启动车辆供电的更大的矩形电池相同。工程学院博士研究员、论文合著者亚历克斯·英曼（Alex Inman）表示：“我们得到了一个面积为25平方厘米的浸镀五电池堆的优化配置，以产生为可编程设备供电所需的电负载。” “我们还对电池进行真空密封，以防止性能下降。这种封装方法可以适用于商业产品。”性能最好的纺织超级电容器为Arduino Pro mini 3.3V微控制器供电，该控制器能够每30秒无线传输温度
content_en: Powering wearable technology with MXene textile supercapacitor 'patch'Researchers at Drexel University are one step closer to making wearable textile technology a reality. Recently published in the Journal of Materials Chemistry A, materials scientists from Drexel's College of Engineering, in partnership with a team at Accenture Labs, have reported a new design of a flexible wearable supercapacitor patch. It uses MXene, a material discovered at Drexel University in 2011, to create a textile-based supercapacitor that can charge in minutes and power an Arduino microcontroller temperature sensor and radio communication of data for almost two hours."This is a significant development for wearable technology," said Yury Gogotsi, Ph.D., Distinguished University and Bach professor in Drexel's College of Engineering, who co-authored the study. "To fully integrate technology into fabric, we must also be able to seamlessly integrate its power source—our invention shows the path forward for textile energy storage devices."Co-authored along with Gogotsi's undergraduate and postdoctoral students, Genevieve Dion, professor and director of the Center for Functional Fabrics, and researchers from Accenture Labs in California, the study builds on previous research that looked at durability, electric conductivity and energy storage capacity of MXene-functionalized textiles that did not push to optimize the textile for powering electronics beyond passive devices such as LED lights. The latest work shows that not only can it withstand the rigors of being a textile, but it can also store and deliver enough power to run programmable electronics collecting and transmitting environmental data for hours—progress that could position it for use in health care technology."While there are many materials out there that can be integrated into textiles, MXene has a distinct advantage over other materials because of its natural conductivity and ability to disperse in water as a stable colloidal solution. This means textiles can easily be coated with MXene without using chemical additives—and additional production steps—to get the MXene to adhere to the fabric," said Tetiana Hryhorchuk, a doctoral researcher in Drexel's College of Engineering and co-author. "As a result, our supercapacitor showed a high energy density and enabled functional applications such as powering programmable electronics, which is needed for implementing textile-based energy storage into the real-life applications."Drexel researchers have been exploring the possibility of adapting MXene, a conductive two-dimensional nanomaterial, as a coating that can imbue a wide range of materials with exceptional properties of conductivity, durability, impermeability to electromagnetic radiation, and energy storage.Recently, the team has looked at ways of using conductive MXene yarn to create textiles that sense and respond to temperature, movement and pressure. But to fully integrate these fabric devices as "wearables" the researchers also needed to find a way to weave a power source into the mix."Flexible, stretchable and truly textile-grade energy storing platforms have so far remained missing from most e-textile systems due to the insufficient performance metrics of current available materials and technologies," the research team wrote. "Previous studies reported sufficient mechanical strength to withstand industrial knitting. However, the demonstrated application only included simple devices."The team set out to design its MXene textile supercapacitor patch with the goal of maximizing energy storage capacity while using a minimal amount of active material and taking up the smallest amount of space—to reduce the overall cost of production and preserve flexibility and wearability of the garment.To create the supercapacitor, the team simply dipped small swatches of woven cotton textile into a MXene solution and then layered on a lithium chloride electrolyte gel. Each supercapacitor cell consists of two layers of MXene-coated textile with an electrolyte separator also made of cotton textile. To make a patch with enough power to run some useful devices—Arduino programmable microcontrollers, in this case—the team stacked five cells to create a power pack capable of charging to 6 volts, the same amount as the larger rectangular batteries often used to power golf carts, electric lanterns, or for jump-starting vehicles."We came to the optimized configuration of a dip-coated, five-cell stack with an area of 25 square centimeters to produce the electrical loading necessary to power programmable devices," said Alex Inman, a doctoral researcher in the College of Engineering, and co-author of the paper. "We also vacuum-sealed the cells to prevent degradation in performance. This packaging approach could be applicable to commercial products."The best-performing textile supercapacitor powered an Arduino Pro Mini 3.3V microcontroller that was able to wirelessly transmit temperature every 30 seconds for 96 minutes. It maintained this level of performance consistently for more than 20 days."The initial report of a MXene textile supercapacitor powering a practical peripheral electronics system demonstrates the potential of this family of two-dimensional materials to support a wide range of devices such as motion trackers and biomedical monitors in a flexible textile form," Gogotsi said.The research team notes that this is one of the highest total power outputs on record for a textile energy device, but it can still improve. As they continue to develop the technology, they will test different electrolytes and textile electrode configurations to boost voltage, as well as designing it in a variety of wearable forms."Power for existing e-textile devices still largely relies on traditional form factors like lithium-polymer and coin cell lithium batteries," the researchers wrote. "As such, most e-textile systems do not use a flexible e-textile architecture that includes flexible energy storage. The MXene supercapacitor developed in this study fills the void, providing a textile-based energy storage solution that can power flexible electronics."
abstract: 近日，由美国德雷克塞尔大学领导的研究团队利用MXene材料研发出一种基于纺织品的超级电容器，它可以为可穿戴技术供电。在这项新的研究中，该团队利用MXene材料研发出一种纺织超级电容器。首先，该团队简单地将小块纺织棉织品浸入MXene溶液中，然后在氯化锂电解质凝胶上分层。每个超级电容器电池由两层涂有MXene的织物组成，电解质隔板也由棉织物制成。为了制作一个有足够电力来运行可编程微控制器，该团队堆叠了五个电池，创建出一个能够充电到6V的电源包，它与通常用于为高尔夫球车、电灯或跳电启动车辆供电的较大矩形电池的电量相同。最后，该团队研制出一个浸渍涂层的五单元堆栈的优化配置，其面积为25平方厘米，可以产生为可编程设备供电所需的电气负载。此外，他们还对电池进行真空密封，以防止性能下降。该研究提供了一种基于纺织品的储能解决方案，可以为柔性电子设备供电。

title: 日本研发出店卫生间自动清洁机器人系统
keyword: 机器人系统 洗手间清洁 抽水马桶 地板清洁装置
content_zh: 便利商店洗手间自动清洁系统东京都市大学的研究人员发明了一种机器人系统，可以自动清洁便利商店和其他公共场所的洗手间。 这一系统在发表在《先进机器人技术》上的一篇论文中介绍，将在世界机器人峰会(WRS)上参加未来便利店挑战赛(FCSC)，这是一场旨在自动化便利店的最先进技术的比赛。“许多便利店为顾客提供洗手间，洗手间清洁是业务的重要组成部分，”开发该系统的研究人员之一和田和义告诉TechXplore。 “虽然清洁洗手间是为了卫生目的所必需的，但它涉及脑力和体力的艰苦工作。店员通常不适合在便利店清洁厕所；而且由于店员对清洁的看法不同，保持一致的清洁水平很困难。”WRS设立FCSC比赛，以鼓励发展可提高便利店效率的新技术。 能够自主清洁洗手间和厕所的机器人系统尤其有助于改善卫生状况，同时简化商店店员和便利店清洁工的工作。“我们的系统将在FCSC中竞争，以期将来在真实环境中应用，”世界反兴奋剂机构说。 “该系统由马桶顶面清洁机构、马桶升降机构和洗手间地面清洁机器人组成。通过将洗手间空间本身机器人化，该系统旨在简化清洁操作，并在短时间内（不到20秒）实现精确清洁。”研究人员的系统在清洁洗手间时，马桶自动升起，地面清洁机构（存储在马桶后面）移动到马桶前面的区域。 随后，展开带有吸水片的清洁工具，并开始擦拭地板和马桶的侧面，同时收集地板上的任何垃圾。 当清洁工具清洁地板时，马桶座圈背面内置的一个设备清洁马桶边缘。“这个系统最独特的特点是它使用了一个允许马桶升降的机制，”瓦达说。 “马桶被举到男人的胯部高度，以减少尿液的散落，并为地板清洁创造空间。”瓦达和他的同事在一系列实验中测试了他们的系统，预计该系统将清洁假尿液和垃圾。 他们发现它表现得非常好，在大约17秒内完成了单独的清洁任务，并清除了97.8%的尿液样液体。研究人员希望未来他们的系统将商业化，并在真正的便利店中实施。 此外，他们设计的马桶升降机构可以启发类似洗手间清洁系统的创建。“我们相信我们的工作可以为带有清洁系统的厕所空间开发一个新的市场，”Wada说。 “在我们目前的系统中，每次清洗都会更换清洗设备，这对实际商店使用是不现实的。为了解决这个问题，我们现在计划实现一个功能，允许清洗设备每次清洗或在未来更换新的。
content_en: An automated system to clean restrooms in convenience storesResearchers at Tokyo Metropolitan University have created a robotic system that could automate the cleaning of restrooms in convenience stores and other public spaces. This system, introduced in a paper published in Advanced Robotics, will be competing in the Future Convenience Store Challenge (FCSC) at the World Robot Summit (WRS), a competition for state-of-the-art technologies to automate convenience stores."Many convenience stores provide restrooms for customers, and restroom cleaning is an essential part of the business," Kazuyoshi Wada, one of the researchers who developed the system, told TechXplore. "While restroom cleaning is necessary for sanitary purposes, it involves mental and physical hard work. Clerks are often inappropriate for cleaning toilets in convenience stores; and maintaining consistent cleanliness levels is difficult because of the different perceptions of cleanliness among clerks."The WRS established the FCSC competition to encourage the development of new technologies that could enhance efficiency in convenience stores. Robotic systems that can autonomously clean restrooms and toilets could particularly help to improve hygiene, while simplifying the work of shop clerks and convenience store cleaners."Our system will compete in the FCSC, with a view to applying it in real-settings in the future," Wada said. "The system consists of a toilet bowl top surface cleaning mechanism, a toilet bowl lifting mechanism, and a restroom floor cleaning robot. By robotizing the restroom space itself, the system aims to streamline the cleaning operation and achieve accurate cleaning in a short time (less than 20 s)."While the researchers' system is cleaning a restroom, toilet bowls are automatically raised and a floor cleaning mechanism (stored behind the bowl) moves to the area in front of the toilets. Subsequently, a cleaning tool with water-absorbing sheets is deployed and starts wiping the floor and sides of the toilet bowl, while simultaneously collecting any garbage on the floor. As the cleaning tool cleans the floor, a device built into the back of the toilet seat cleans the toilet rim."The most unique feature of this system is that it uses a mechanism that allows the toilet bowl to be raised or lowered," Wada said. "The toilet bowl is lifted to the height of a man's crotch to reduce the scattering of urine and create space for floor cleaning."Wada and his colleagues tested their system in a series of experiments, where it was expected to clean fake urine and garbage. They found that it performed remarkably well, completing individual cleaning tasks in approximately 17s and removing 97.8% of the urine-like liquid.In the future, the researchers hope that their system will be commercialized and implemented in real convenience stores. In addition, the toilet bowl lifting mechanism they designed could inspire the creation of similar restroom cleaning systems."We believe that our work could lead to the development of a new market for toilet spaces with cleaning systems," Wada said. "In our current system, the cleaning equipment is replaced with every cleaning, which is unrealistic for actual store use. To address this issue, we now plan to implement a function that allows cleaning equipment to be cleaned each time or replaced with a new one in the future.
abstract: 近日，由日本东京城市大学领导的研究团队研发出全新机器人系统，能够自动清洁便利店和其他公共场所卫生间。许多便利店都为顾客提供卫生间，卫生间清洁是便利店服务业务的重要组成部分。出于卫生目的打扫卫生间是必要的，但这项工作十分艰苦，需要耗费大量脑力和体力，店员很难有额外精力打扫卫生间。在新研究中，团队研究人员研发的机器人系统由抽水马桶表面清洁机构、抽水马桶提升机构和卫生间地板清洁机器人组成。当该系统正在清洁卫生间时，抽水马桶会自动升起，地板清洁装置（存储在马桶后面）会移动到抽水马桶前方区域。随后，展开具有吸水片的清洁工具，并开始擦拭抽水马桶的地板和侧面，同时收集地板上的垃圾。当清洁工具清洁地板时，安装在马桶座圈背面的装置开始清洁马桶边缘。研究人员通过测试发现，该机器人系统表现非常好，在大约17秒内就能完成清洁任务，并清除掉97.8%的尿液样液体。该系统有望快速实现商业化，以用于便利店卫生间清洁。

title: 韩国研发出以水为电解质的稳定水锌离子电池
keyword: 电解质 水锌离子电池 嵌段共聚物 锌阳极 枝晶生长
content_zh: 研究团队开发基于锌的水性充电电池我们在没有空气的情况下生存三分钟还是在没有水的情况下生存三天？ 没有电池怎么样？ 想象一下，三个小时没有电池。轻质、高容量的锂离子电池广泛应用于移动电话、笔记本电脑和当今世界的其他必需品。 然而，传统锂离子电池中的有机电解质高度易燃，导致致命的火灾或爆炸。 由于锂离子电池在我们的生活中被广泛使用，这类事故会对用户造成直接损害，这导致了对更安全的电池系统的需求。化学系教授Soojin Park和Gyujin Song（博士后研究员） Postech高级材料科学部门的候选人Sangyeop Lee共同开发了一种以水为电解质的稳定的水性锌离子电池。 他们采用聚合物保护层来防止电极腐蚀和提高锌阳极的稳定性，从而提高水锌离子电池的电化学稳定性。 他们在《细胞报告物理科学》上发表了他们的研究结果。基于有机溶剂的电解质是典型电池系统中离子运动的媒介，本质上是易燃的，有爆炸或火灾的风险。 为了解决这一问题，水电解质电池正被开发成为有希望的替代品。 然而，锌阳极在水电解质中的可逆性较差，这是由于锌枝晶和表面副反应造成的，阻碍了锌离子电池的应用，Postech研究团队利用嵌段共聚物开发了一种涂覆多功能保护层的锌阳极。 这种新型聚合物层具有弹性和伸缩性，在电池充放电过程中能承受体积膨胀，聚合物保护层能诱导均匀的离子分布，抑制枝晶生长，从而延长锌阳极的使用寿命。 薄膜层还通过抑制电极表面电解质中不必要的化学/电化学反应提高了电极的稳定性。此外，研究人员利用飞行时间二次离子质谱（TOF-SIMS）分析揭示了锌离子在涂层中的运动。 对锌离子运动的成像是对电池阳极表面性质的进一步研究。
content_en: Research team develops aqueous rechargeable batteries based on zinc anodesCan we survive three minutes without air or three days without water? How about without batteries? Imagine not having a battery for three hours.Lightweight, high-capacity lithium-ion batteries are widely used in mobile phones, laptops, and other necessities in today's world. However, the organic electrolytes in conventional lithium-ion batteries are highly flammable, leading to fatal fires or explosions. As lithium-ion batteries are widely used in our lives, such accidents can cause direct damage to users, which has led to a demand for a safer battery system.Professor Soojin Park and Gyujin Song (Post-doc fellow) in the Department of Chemistry and Ph.D. candidate Sangyeop Lee of the Division of Advanced Materials Science at POSTECH together developed a stable aqueous zinc-ion battery that uses water as an electrolyte. They employed a protective polymer layer to prevent electrode corrosion and increase the stability of the zinc anode, improving the electrochemical stability of the aqueous zinc-ion battery. They published their results in Cell Reports Physical Science.The organic-solvent-based electrolyte, which serves as a medium for ions to move inside the typical battery system, is inherently flammable, posing risk of explosion or fire. To address this issue, aqueous electrolyte batteries are being developed as promising replacements. However, the inferior reversibility of the zinc anode in aqueous electrolytes, which are caused by zinc dendrites and surface side reactions, has prevented zinc-ion batteries from being used.The POSTECH research team developed a zinc anode coated with a multifunctional protective layer by using a block copolymer. This new polymer layer is elastic and stretchable, enduring volume expansion during battery charging and discharging.The polymer protective layer is found to induce homogenized ion distribution and suppress dendritic growth, contributing to a long-term zinc anode lifespan. The thin film layer also improves the electrode stability by suppressing unnecessary chemical/electrochemical reactions in the electrolyte on the electrode surface.Furthermore, the researchers revealed the movement of zinc ions in the coating layer by using time-of-flight secondary ion mass spectrometry (TOF-SIMS) analysis. Imaging the zinc ion movements, which was not successful in previous studies, promises further research on the surface properties of battery anodes.
abstract: 近日，韩国浦项理工大学研究团队研发出一种以水为电解质的稳定水锌离子电池。轻质、高容量的锂离子电池广泛应用于当今世界的手机、笔记本电脑和其他必需品。然而，传统锂离子电池中的有机电解质是高度易燃的，会导致致命的火灾或爆炸。在新研究中，研究人员利用嵌段共聚物为该电池的锌阳极涂覆多功能保护层，使电池具有弹性和可拉伸性，从而在电池充放电过程中承受体积膨胀。此外，研究人员还发现聚合物保护层能诱导离子均匀分布，抑制枝晶生长，这有助于提高锌阳极寿命。同时，薄膜层还可以通过抑制电极表面电解液中不必要的化学/电化学反应来提高电池电极的稳定性。最后，研究人员通过飞行时间二次离子质谱（TOF-SIMS）分析揭示了锌离子在涂层中的运动。对锌离子运动的成像在以往的研究中并不成功，此研究将为进一步研究电池阳极的表面特性提供新的希望。

title: 日本利用化学气相沉积技术制造出纳米级半导体
keyword: 化学气相沉积 超晶格 金属半导体 反常霍尔效应
content_zh: 简单的技术带来了长期寻求的半导体领域，现代微电子学的突破依赖于理解和操纵电子在金属中的运动。 将金属板的厚度降低到纳米量级，就可以对金属电子的运动进行精确的控制。 通过这样做，人们可以传授在块状金属中看不到的特性，如超快导电。 现在，来自大坂大学的研究人员和合作伙伴合成了一类新型纳米结构超晶格。 这项研究使得对金属半导体中电子运动的控制达到了异常高的程度，这有望增强日常技术的功能。 精确地调整金属纳米片的结构，从而促进先进的微电子功能，仍然是世界范围内正在进行的工作。 事实上，关于这个主题已经颁发了几个诺贝尔奖。 研究人员通常用相同尺寸的材料合成纳米结构超晶格--有规律地交替的金属层，夹在一起； 例如，夹层2D床单。 本研究工作的一个关键方面是它轻而易举地制备了异质维超晶格； 例如，夹在二维纳米片内的一维纳米颗粒链。资深作者Yung-Chang Lin解释说：“纳米级异质维超晶格的制备通常具有挑战性，但可以显示出有价值的物理特性，如各向异性电导率。” “我们开发了一种制备此类结构的多种方法，这样做将激发合成广泛的定制超结构。”研究人员使用化学气相沉积--工业中常见的纳米加工技术--制备钒基超晶格。 这些磁性半导体表现出所谓的各向异性反常霍尔效应(AHE)：即在面内磁场条件下定向聚焦的电荷积累（在这种情况下，传统的霍尔效应是观察不到的）。 通常，AHE只能在超低温下观测到。 在本研究中，在室温和更高的温度下观察到AHE，至少达到水的沸点附近。 在实际温度下生成AHE将有助于其在日常技术中的应用。林说：“纳米技术的一个关键承诺是它提供了大量材料无法获得的功能。” “我们在室温及以上温度下展示了非常规的反常霍尔效应，为未来半导体技术开辟了丰富的可能性，所有这些都可以通过传统的纳米加工工艺获得。”目前的工作将有助于提高数据存储密度、照明效率和电子器件的速度。 通过精确控制工业中常用金属的纳米级结构，研究人员将制造出独特的多功能技术，超越自然材料的功能。文章《具有室温反常霍尔效应的异维超晶格》发表在《自然》杂志上。
content_en: Simple technique ushers in long-sought class of semiconductorsBreakthroughs in modern microelectronics depend on understanding and manipulating the movement of electrons in metal. Reducing the thickness of metal sheets to the order of nanometers can enable exquisite control over how the metal's electrons move. By doing so, one can impart properties that aren't seen in bulk metals, such as ultrafast conduction of electricity. Now, researchers from Osaka University and collaborating partners have synthesized a novel class of nanostructured superlattices. This study enables an unusually high degree of control over the movement of electrons within metal semiconductors, which promises to enhance the functionality of everyday technologies. Precisely tuning the architecture of metal nanosheets, and thus facilitating advanced microelectronic functionalities, remains an ongoing line of work worldwide. In fact, several Nobel prizes have been awarded on this topic. Researchers conventionally synthesize nanostructured superlattices—regularly alternating layers of metals, sandwiched together—from materials of the same dimension; for example, sandwiched 2D sheets. A key aspect of the present researchers' work is its facile fabrication of hetero-dimensional superlattices; for example, 1D nanoparticle chains sandwiched within 2D nanosheets."Nanoscale hetero-dimensional superlattices are typically challenging to prepare, but can exhibit valuable physical properties, such as anisotropic electrical conductivity," explains Yung-Chang Lin, senior author. "We developed a versatile means of preparing such structures, and in so doing we will inspire synthesis of a wide range of custom superstructures."The researchers used chemical vapor deposition—a common nanofabrication technique in industry—to prepare vanadium-based superlattices. These magnetic semiconductors exhibit what is known as an anisotropic anomalous Hall effect (AHE): meaning directionally focused charge accumulation under in-plane magnetic field conditions (in which the conventional Hall effect isn't observed). Usually, the AHE is observed only at ultra-low temperatures. In the present research, the AHE was observed at room temperature and higher, up to around at least the boiling point of water. Generation of the AHE at practical temperatures will facilitate its use in everyday technologies."A key promise of nanotechnology is its provision of functionalities that you can't get from bulk materials," states Lin. "Our demonstration of an unconventional anomalous Hall effect at room temperature and above opens up a wealth of possibilities for future semiconductor technology, all accessible by conventional nanofabrication processes."The present work will help improve the density of data storage, the efficiency of lighting, and the speed of electronic devices. By precisely controlling the nanoscale architecture of metals that are commonly used in industry, researchers will fabricate uniquely versatile technology that surpasses the functionality of natural materials.The article, "Heterodimensional superlattice with room-temperature anomalous Hall effect," was published in Nature.
abstract: 近日，由日本大阪大学领导的研究团队利用化学气相沉积技术制造出新型纳米结构超晶格，该技术是一种工业上常见的纳米制造技术。现代微电子学的突破依赖于对金属中电子运动的理解和操纵。将金属片厚度减少到纳米量级，可以精确控制金属电子的移动方式。通过这样，人们可以赋予大块金属所没有的特性，如超快导电。在新研究中，研究人员使用该技术制备钒基超晶格。这种超晶格是一种新类型的磁性半导体结构，且这些磁性半导体表现出各向异性反常霍尔效应（AHE）：即在面内磁场条件下使定向聚焦的电荷积累。通常情况下只有在超低温下才能观察到AHE。但在此次研究中，AHE是在室温和100摄氏度左右观察到的。在实际温度下产生AHE将有助于它在日常技术中的应用。该研究实现了对金属半导体中电子运动的高度控制，有助于提高数据存储密度、照明效率和电子设备的速度。

title: 美国开发了一种可以实时监控神经递质的无线大脑植入设备
keyword: 神经递质 无线大脑植入设备 碳纤维复合电极
content_zh: 无线脑植入物实时监控神经递质科学家开发了一种无线、无电池的植入物，能够在小动物模型中实时监控大脑中的多巴胺信号，这一进展有助于理解神经化学物质在神经疾病中的作用。发表在《美国科学院纳米杂志》(ACS Nano）上的一项研究详细描述了这种设备，它使用光激活或抑制大脑中的特定神经元，这是一种被称为光遗传刺激的技术。 该研究的合著者、路易斯·辛普森和金伯利·奎雷伊材料科学与工程、生物医学工程和神经外科教授约翰·罗杰斯博士说，它还记录了自由行为的受试者的多巴胺活性，而不需要笨重或令人望而却步的传感设备。罗杰斯说：“这种设备允许神经科学家以可编程的方式实时监测和调节小鼠的大脑活动--这是神经科学研究的一种非常重要的动物模型。”“该设备的微型尺寸、极其轻质的结构及其无线、无电池的操作模式使得行为研究成为可能，否则是不可能的。 我们能够观察动物在自然环境中以不受阻碍的方式移动和参与时大脑是如何运作的，无论是在孤立的个体还是在社会互动的群体中。“为了创造这种设备，研究人员首先设计了一种微型多巴胺传感器，使用碳纤维复合电极来提供尽可能高的灵敏度。 然后，他们实现了通过外部传输天线供电的无线、无电池电子电路，并使用激光图案化和薄膜沉积制造了一个微小、灵活的植入物。根据研究作者的说法，该设备比最先进的替代方案轻50倍，小10倍。在这项研究中，该设备能够刺激大脑区域，并记录多巴胺活动，以应对小鼠模型中阿片和纳洛酮的暴露。菲利普·古特鲁夫博士说，这项技术将有助于研究神经化学物质如何影响行为、成瘾和神经疾病的发展， 亚利桑那大学生物医学工程助理教授和这项研究的高级作者。罗杰斯实验室前博士后古特鲁夫说：“由于目前研究工具的限制，大脑中的神经化学组成不如电活动那么容易理解。” “然而，神经化学成分在阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症等神经退行性疾病的治疗和检测中非常重要。 我们的工作带来的进展将有助于神经科学界理解基本机制，并验证新的候选疗法。罗杰斯说：“展望未来，研究作者希望改进这种设备，并使其商业化。”罗杰斯也是西北大学罗伯特·H·卢里综合癌症中心的成员，他说：“我们希望将化学传感能力扩展到多巴胺之外的其他神经递质，并允许它同时与大脑的多个区域接口。” “此外，我们希望能够以低成本的方式向更广泛的神经科学家群体提供这项技术，以促进他们自己的研究努力。”
content_en: Wireless brain implant monitors neurotransmitters in real-timeScientists have developed a wireless, battery-free implant capable of monitoring dopamine signals in the brain in real-time in small animal models, an advance that could aid in understanding the role neurochemicals play in neurological disorders.The device, detailed in a study published in ACS Nano, activates or inhibits specific neurons in the brain using light, a technique known as optogenetic stimulation. It also records dopamine activity in freely behaving subjects without the need for bulky or prohibitive sensing equipment, said John Rogers, Ph.D., the Louis Simpson and Kimberly Querrey Professor of Materials Science and Engineering, Biomedical Engineering and Neurological Surgery, and a co-author of the study."This device allows neuroscientists to monitor and modulate brain activity in real-time and in a programmable fashion, in mice—a very important class of animal model for neuroscience studies," Rogers said."The device's miniature size, extremely lightweight construction and its wireless, battery-free mode of operation enables behavioral studies that would otherwise be impossible. We're able to watch how the brain is operating as an animal is moving and engaging in naturalistic environments in an unimpeded manner, in isolated individuals or in socially interacting groups."To create the device, investigators first designed a miniaturized dopamine sensor using carbon-fiber composite electrodes to offer the highest sensitivity possible. Then, they implemented wireless, battery-free electronic circuits powered via external transmission antennae and fabricated the device using laser-patterning and thin film deposition to create a tiny, flexible implant.The device is 50 times lighter and 10 times smaller than the most advanced alternative, according to the study authors.In the study, the device was able to stimulate regions of the brain and record dopamine activity in response to opioid and naloxone exposures in mouse models.The technology will be useful in studying how neurochemicals affect behavior, addiction and the development of neurological diseases, said Philipp Gutruf, Ph.D., assistant professor of Biomedical Engineering at the University of Arizona and senior author of the study."Neurochemical composition in the brain is an area that, because of the current limitation of research tools, is not as well understood as electrical activity," said Gutruf, a former postdoctoral fellow in the Rogers laboratory. "However, neurochemical composition is indicated to be very important in the treatment and detection of neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer's and Parkinson's. Advances introduced by our work will help the neuroscience community to understand fundamental mechanisms and validate new therapy candidates."Moving forward, the study authors hope to refine the device and make it commercially available, Rogers said."We want to extend the chemical sensing capabilities to other neurotransmitters besides dopamine and allow for it to interface with multiple regions of the brain simultaneously," said Rogers, who is also a member of the Robert H. Lurie Comprehensive Cancer Center of Northwestern University. "Additionally, we'd like to be able to make this technology available to the broader community of neuroscientists in a low-cost way to facilitate their own research efforts."
abstract: 近日，美国西北大学设计了一种碳纤维复合电极的高灵敏度小型多巴胺传感器，可以实时监控大脑的神经递质。该研究使用了无线、无电池的电子电路，通过外部传输天线供电，并使用激光制图和薄膜沉积制造出一个微小、灵活的植入设备，比最先进的替代品重量轻50倍，尺寸小10倍。该设备主要利用光激活或者是抑制大脑中的特定神经元，还可记录受试者的多巴胺活动，并可以可编程的方式实时监测和调节受试者的大脑活动。该研究有助于帮助神经科学认识到大脑活动的基本机制，验证新的大脑治疗方案。

title: 日本研发出可用于非线性光学领域的全新光操纵技术
keyword: 光操纵技术 非Bravais晶格 干法蚀刻 近红外光
content_zh: 非Bravais晶格在光控制技术中的应用包括京都大学在内的一个国际小组开发了一种新的光操纵技术，可以应用于激光器、传感器和非线性光学。 该技术将近红外光严格限制在纳米盘周期结构中。 通过打破硅纳米盘周期性正方形晶格的对称性，该团队在实验和计算上证明了他们系统控制连续体中束缚态的能力。这些光分布状态是由硅纳米盘散射波相消干涉逃逸的光的全局抵消造成的。“在这项研究中，从硅纳米盘的周期性正方形晶格--一个Bravais晶格--开始，通过改变单位晶格中第二个晶格点的位置和圆盘的大小，制成了三种类型的非Bravais晶格，”主要作者Shunsuke Murai解释说。在Bravais晶格中， 在晶体学中，为了帮助我们理解和分类晶体结构，所有的晶格点都是等价的，这意味着所有的晶格点都可以被单位晶胞叠加。非Bravais晶格是通过引入第二个非等价晶格点来生成的。 这些样品是用电子束光刻和干法刻蚀制备的。从磁偶极子（绿箭头）和电偶极子（黄）激发的Si纳米盘的第二BIC态。 功劳：京都大学“我们应用了由硅纳米盘组成的光导或光敏非布拉瓦晶格来控制近红外光，”作者补充道。然而，通过选择这些晶格的适当周期和纳米盘的材料，而不限于硅，在从紫外到毫米波的宽频率范围内，BIC控制是可能的。表面晶格共振，纳米盘中的偶极子（表示为箭头）通过面内衍射（盘之间的波垂直于箭头振荡）耦合。 功劳：京都大学村井总结说，“鉴于制造缺陷是不可避免的，在制造这些晶格时，BIC对缺陷的鲁棒控制是一个额外的奖励和令人鼓舞的惊喜。”这项研究发表在激光和光子学评论上。
content_en: Application of non-Bravais lattices to light control technologyA novel light-manipulating technology has been developed by an international team, including Kyoto University, that can be applied to lasers, sensors, and nonlinear optics. The technique tightly confines near-infrared light within a nanodisk periodic structure. By breaking the symmetry of the periodic square lattice of silicon nanodisks, the team has demonstrated experimentally and computationally their ability to systematically control bound states in the continuum, or BICs.These light distribution states result from global cancelation of light escaping by destructive interference of scattering waves from silicon nanodisks."In this study, starting from a periodic square lattice of a silicon nanodisk—a Bravais lattice—three types of non-Bravais lattices were made by varying the position of a second lattice point in the unit lattice and the size of the disk," explains lead author Shunsuke Murai.In Bravais lattices, used in crystallography to help us understand and classify crystal structures, all the lattice points were equivalent, meaning all those points could be superimposed by the unit cell.Non-Bravais lattices were created by introducing a second non-equivalent lattice point. These samples were produced using electron-beam lithography and dry etching.Second BIC state from magnetic (green arrows) and electric (yellow) dipoles excited in Si nanodisks. Credit: Kyoto University "We applied phototonic, or photosensitive, non-Bravais lattices consisting of silicon nanodisks to control near-infrared light," the author adds.However, by selecting the appropriate period of these lattices and the material of the nanodisks, not limited to silicon, BIC control may be possible over a wide frequency range from UV to millimeter waves.Surface lattice resonance, where the dipoles (represented as arrows) in nanodisks are coupled via in-plane diffraction (waves between the disks oscillating perpendicular to the arrows). Credit: Kyoto University Murai concludes, "The robustness of BIC control over the imperfections in fabricating these lattices was a bonus and an encouraging surprise, given that manufacturing flaws are inevitable."The study appears in Laser & Photonics Reviews.
abstract: 近日，由日本京都大学领导的研究团队研发出一种全新的光操纵技术，该技术可应用于激光、传感器和非线性光学等领域。在新研究中，研究人员首先从硅纳米圆盘的周期性正方形布拉维（Bravais）晶格开始，通过改变单位晶格中第二个晶格点的位置和圆盘大小，制作出三种类型的非Bravais晶格。在晶体学中用于帮助理解和分类晶体结构的Bravais晶格中，所有晶格点都是等价的，这意味着所有这些点都可以被晶胞叠加。而非Bravais晶格则是通过引入第二个非等价晶格点而产生的。这些样品是用电子束光刻和干法蚀刻制作的。研究团队利用由硅纳米盘组成的光敏非Bravais晶格来控制近红外光，将近红外光紧紧地限制在纳米盘周期结构中，通过打破硅纳米盘周期性方形晶格的对称性，研究人员利用实验和计算得到了系统控制连续体（BICs）中束缚态的能量状态。该研究为全新非线性光学光操纵技术的研发提供了新方案，推动了光子电学领域的发展。

title: 韩国使用聚乙烯亚胺水凝胶助力电化学制氢
keyword: 超疏油性 水凝胶 析氢反应 电催化剂
content_zh: 超疏水性聚乙烯亚胺水凝胶通过促进气泡脱除来提高电化学产氢能力UNIST的研究小组最近报道，通过对碱性析氢电极进行改性，即使不需要昂贵的电催化剂和复杂的过程，也能显著提高电极的性能。 这项突破是由Unist能源工程系的Jungki Ryu教授及其研究小组领导的。在这项研究中，研究小组报告了一种简单的策略，通过在底层电极上添加多孔聚合物水凝胶来提高电化学制氢的效率。 研究小组指出，通过Schiff碱缩合反应和冷冻干燥交联聚乙烯亚胺(PEI)可以很容易地将超憎气水凝胶涂覆在目标基底上，因此，通过改变交联时PEI的浓度，可以很容易地控制水凝胶涂覆电极的孔径、孔隙率和超憎气性能。 根据研究小组的说法，由于容易去除生成的氢气泡，用PEI水凝胶修饰的NF电极只比用昂贵的电催化剂修饰的NF电极性能好，尤其是在高电流密度下。研究小组指出：“我们相信，我们的结果可以通过为电极和电解槽的设计提供见解，为水电解的实际应用铺平道路。”这项研究已经发表在《先进能源材料》上。
content_en: Superaerophobic polyethyleneimine hydrogels improve electrochemical hydrogen production by promoting bubble detachmentA research team affiliated with UNIST recently reported that the performance of electrodes for an alkaline hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) can be significantly improved even without expensive electrocatalysts and complicated processes by modifying them with superaerophobic polymeric hydrogels. This breakthrough has been led by Professor Jungki Ryu and his research team in the Department of Energy Engineering at UNIST.In this study, the research team reported a simple strategy to enhance the efficiency of electrochemical hydrogen production by imparting superaerophobicity to an underlying electrode with porous polymeric hydrogels. Superaerophobic hydrogels were readily coated on target substrates by cross-linking polyethyleneimine (PEI) via Schiff-base condensation reactions followed by freeze-drying, noted the research team.As a result, they could readily control the pore size, porosity, and superaerophobicity of the hydrogel-coated electrodes by varying the concentrations of PEI upon cross-linking. Due to facile removal of as-generated hydrogen bubbles, the NF electrode modified with PEI hydrogel only outperformed those modified with expensive electrocatalysts especially at high current densities, according to the research team."We believe that our results can pave the way for the practical application of water electrolysis by providing insights into the design of electrodes and electrolyzers," noted the research team.This study has been published in Advanced Energy Materials.
abstract: 近日，韩国蔚山国家科学技术研究所的研究人员使用超疏油性聚乙烯亚胺水凝胶通过促进气泡分离来改善电化学制氢。为了从电极表面去除气泡维持电化学气体释放反应，研究人员开发了一种在电极简单涂覆多孔聚合物水凝胶提高析氢反应效率的方法，该方法使用的水凝胶属于超厌氧聚合物，可以快速去除产生的气泡，不会影响目标基板赋予各种电极超疏水性。特别是在产生和粘附更多气泡的高电流密度下，用具有超疏油性的水凝胶修饰的电极比用电催化剂修饰的电极去除气泡效果更好。该过程不需要使用昂贵的电催化剂和复杂的工艺，就可以提高碱性析氢反应的电极性能。这一研究成果为电解水的实际应用铺平道路，为电极和电解槽的设计提供新的见解。

title: 印度研发出有望增强量子通信和成像功能的再生光子纠缠技术
keyword: 光子纠缠 量子通信 量子成像 自我恢复 角位置纠缠
content_zh: 恢复的光子纠缠可以增强量子通信和成像印度的研究人员已经表明，当光子离开源传播时，在一定的连续变量基础上，光子纠缠会自我恢复。 这一发现可能有助于长距离安全传输量子信息和在湍流介质中进行量子成像。物理学家正在广泛探索光子之间的量子纠缠，通常旨在开发用于计算、通信、传感和成像的新量子技术。 一些潜在的应用要求在远距离或湍流环境中无损失地发送纠缠光子。 然而，目前在这种情况下保持某些类型的纠缠非常棘手--成功与否取决于许多因素，包括量子信息如何在光子中编码。现在，印度理工学院坎普尔量子光学和纠缠实验室的阿南德·贾和同事通过使用光子的角位置来编码信息，提供了一种可能的解决方案。 他们观察到，当光子传播时，纠缠似乎消失了，但后来奇怪地又出现了。 他们还表明，即使光子穿过湍流空气后，纠缠也会恢复，这通常会破坏纠缠。 他们在《科学进展》中描述了他们的研究。光子纠缠光子有许多不同的自由度，可以用来编码量子信息。 选择取决于必须编码的信息类型。 对于量子比特，可以使用光子的偏振或轨道角动量等离散性质。 但有时，尤其是为了传感和成像目的，以更连续的方式编码量子信息会更好。 在这类应用中，被探索最多的纠缠性质--或称为“基”--是由光子的笛卡尔坐标给出的光子位置。量子纠缠现象赋予粒子一种比经典物理学所允许的更密切的关系，并且与用来编码量子信息的特定基无关。 然而，在实验中使用或测量纠缠的方式可能不是基础独立的。 这适用于纠缠“见证”，它是决定系统是否纠缠的数学量。 对于连续基，见证子与基相关，这种依赖性意味着某些类型的连续纠缠比其他类型的纠缠更有用。对于位置-动量基，当光子离开源传播时，通过见证子看到的纠缠很快就消失了。 为了解决这个问题，科学家通常利用光子之间的纠缠来对源本身进行成像。 路径中的任何湍流也会迅速破坏纠缠，需要像自适应光学这样的复杂解决方案来恢复纠缠。 这些额外的校正步骤限制了这些纠缠光子的用途。Jha和同事的这项最新研究探索了如何通过使用一个密切相关的替代基础--光子的角位置--来保持纠缠。纠缠体的产生、丢失和恢复在他们的实验中，研究人员通过将高功率“泵浦”激光器的光发送到非线性晶体中来产生纠缠光子。 在光子能量和动量守恒的条件下，一个泵浦光子将产生两个纠缠光子，这一过程称为自发参量下转换(SPDC)。 这两个光子的所有性质都是纠缠在一起的。 例如，如果在一个位置探测到光子，则自动确定另一个纠缠光子的位置。 其他量也存在这种关联，如动量、角位置和轨道角动量。在没有任何纠正措施的情况下，研究人员观察到光子之间的位置纠缠在传播约4厘米后消失。 另一方面，角位置纠缠发生了一些有趣的事情。 它在传播约5厘米后消失，但在光子再传播20厘米后，纠缠又出现了（见图）。 研究人员用数值模型定性地证实了他们的实验结果。当团队在纠缠光子的路径上创造了一个湍流环境时，也观察到了同样的趋势。 这是用吹风加热器来搅动空气并改变其折射率。 在这种情况下，当光传播了更长的距离约45厘米后，纠缠又恢复了。目前还不完全知道是什么原因导致了角位置基上的纠缠再次出现。 基础是特殊的，因为它绕了一个完整的圈。 根据JHA的说法，这是它的区别因素之一。尽管这项研究证明了在小于一米的距离上的鲁棒性，JHA和他的同事声称T
